classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
Intense vivid color in a lipstick with a matte finish – all in one stroke.

Gucci Beauty presents Rouge à Lèvres Mat, the new matte lipstick from Gucci Makeup, born under the creative direction of Alessandro Michele.

Gucci Makeup is creating a new set of beauty ideals embracing self-expression and diversity by breaking industry traditions. A new matte lipstick formula is born from this vision, Rouge à Lèvres Mat.

Delivering bright and rich lip colour with a soft and velvety feel, the texture of Rouge à Lèvres Mat has a silk-like, comfortable finish, without drying out lips or color smudging. The collection’s 28 hue palette includes rich nudes, oranges and pinks, reds, purples and a shade of majestic green—inspired by the particular tone seen in the clothes Alessandro Michele sends down the runway.

Rouge à Lèvres Mat’s gold metal hued tube reveals evenly spaced narrow ribbed grooves etched vertically into its length. Precise and elegant, the packaging recalls the era when lipstick tubes were an execution in art and decoration.

Delivering bright and rich lip colour with a soft and velvety feel, the texture of Rouge à Lèvres Mat has a silk-like, comfortable finish, without drying out lips or color smudging. The collection’s 28 hue palette includes rich nudes, oranges and pinks, reds, purples and a shade of majestic green—inspired by the particular tone seen in the clothes Alessandro Michele sends down the runway.

Rouge à Lèvres Mat’s gold metal hued tube reveals evenly spaced narrow ribbed grooves etched vertically into its length. Precise and elegant, the packaging recalls the era when lipstick tubes were an execution in art and decoration.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
A longwearing foundation for stress-free days in the outdoors! 
In a single step, this high coverage foundation with cushion provides a glowy, flawless and clear complexion. Its fresh texture conceals imperfections and blemishes, all while letting the skin breathe, unveiling a radiant complexion. 
Travel-friendly and convenient like a compact foundation, unifying and corrective like a liquid foundation, it protects the skin, thanks to its SPF 50 / PA+++ and the Clarins anti-pollution complex. 
A transfer-proof foundation that preserves the skin’s hydration and ensures a glowy complexion.

mp00063187.name: Victoria's Secret Velvet Petals Body Lotion 236ml

mp00053352.name: Helena Rubinstein Prodigy Cellglow The Deep Renewing Concentrate

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Experience the power of Edelweiss native cells. From this flower of infinite strength, growing in the Swiss Alps, its native cells are extracted and combined with two other Edelweiss extracts. This triple extract, the Cellular Supreme of Edelweiss™, taken to an outstanding 10% concentration, is revealed in a moist-infusing rosy-glow anti ageing serum. Skin is instantly and lastingly replumped, redensified, lastingly glowing. You feel youthfully radiant, as full of life.After your lotion, apply your anti ageing serum gently all over the face, then activate it's brightening effect by pinching along your cheekbones, working upwards.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Ck one is a naturally clean, pure, and contemporary fragrance with a refreshingly new point of view. This light, relaxed scent is meant to be used lavishly. Ck one Eau de Toilette can literally be splashed all over the body. It is an intimate fragrance, one that you need to be near to smell.Notes: Bergamot, Cardamom, Fresh Pineapple, Papaya, Jasmine, Violet, Rose, Nutmeg, Musk.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Dolce & Gabbana Light Blue: The joy of living the light blue Mediterranean life. Rediscover the original celebration of sensual Mediterranean style. Capturing sun-drenched summer days and dazzling nights, this colourful, fresh, floral-fruity scent reflects the sexiness of the Mediterranean lifestyle.Top notes: Invigorating Sicilian cedar melds with the crisp vibrancy of apple and the guileless charm of the bluebell, to evoke the essence of a South Italian summer. Heart notes: The freshness of bamboo nestles amid a glorious feminine bouquet of decadent jasmine and delicate white rose. Base notes: Redolent citron wood is entwined with voluptuous amber and a suggestive caress of musk.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: The women’s fragrance with a wealth of flowers, a hint of warmth, a deepening of emotions. With a heart of water hyacinth, brightened with mandarin and blond woods. Wear it and have a happy heart.• Spray it on.• Can be used in daytime or evening.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: ETERNITY AIR captures all the different shades of sky and the purest oxygen in the Sky of The Sky accord and ties it to the essence of everlasting love.ETERNITY AIR for Men opens with the freshness of the sky of the sky accord, through which a rush of mandarin and juniper berry unfold. At its heart lavender flows in vibrant violet and green apple notes. Patchouli, and ambergris add depth and character as it dries. Dynamic. Fresh. Masculine.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Nomade Eau de Toilette embodies freedom-loving women: modern, sunny and natural with timeless elegance .A sunny interpretation of the Eau de Parfum. Built on the vibrant sweetness of Litchi and the multi-faceted floral nuances of Freesia, which complement the character of oak moss and enhance the notes of this luminous fragrance.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: HUGO BOSS introduces BOSS THE SCENT, its new seductive perfume for men. An irresistible fragrance, unforgettable like a savored seduction. Exquisite notes of Ginger, exotic Maninka and Leather unfold over time, seducing the senses.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Rare Kyara wood. Prized in the Kohdo ceremony, the highly ritualised Japanese art of incense appreciation. Enriched with amber and black orchid. Illuminated by the clean sensuality of black cardamom, ginger and water lily. Calm and relaxing.Suitable to spray on pulse points. You may use the fragrance on its own or combine it with another scent to create a scent that is uniquely yours.Top: Black CardamomHeart: Black OrchidBase: Kyara Incense

mp00048232.name: Giorgio Armani Light Di Gioia EDP

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Light di Gioia, the feminine fragrance by Giorgio Armani, is an homage to the golden hour of the day, when the sun goes down and the light, stll radiant, becomes sof and warm, leaving beautful shadows behind. Light di Gioia starts with a bright green zest of Italian bergamot, followed by a sparkling duo of Jasmine and Gardenia. Addictve notes of a woody accord enhance this radiant joyful fragrance. With curved lines, inspired by the forms of nature, the pure, organic botle design is a modern embodiment of Giorgio Armani's vision of essental elegance, referencing the search for the contemporary and authentc femininity that inspires him.This fragrance was created for the radiant woman, natural and positve, who reconnects to her inner self to shine outApply on pulse point: wrist, inner elbow and neck.

mp00048257.name: BVLGARI Bvlgari Man Wood Essence Set

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
BVLGARI MAN WOOD ESSENCE epitomizes the strong ties between the City and Nature. Bridging urban life and wide open-spaces, the new Eau de Parfum reconnects man with his own inner strength. 

A perfume pervaded by a powerful green freshness and exhaling a wood-driven life force. A scent of authenticity and a return to cardinal values. 

Created by Master Perfumer Alberto Morillas, BVLGARI MAN WOOD ESSENCE blends a wood trio uniting the finest perfumery essences – Cedar, Cypress, and Vetiver – resonating with the warm and sunny notes of Benzoin resins. Incredible freshness tinged with an Italian zest and the subtly aromatic green accents of Coriander.

Perfect for travelers, this set includes a 100ml and 15ml EDP.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
BVLGARI MAN WOOD ESSENCE epitomizes the strong ties between the City and Nature. Bridging urban life and wide open-spaces, the new Eau de Parfum reconnects man with his own inner strength. 

A perfume pervaded by a powerful green freshness and exhaling a wood-driven life force. A scent of authenticity and a return to cardinal values. 

Created by Master Perfumer Alberto Morillas, BVLGARI MAN WOOD ESSENCE blends a wood trio uniting the finest perfumery essences – Cedar, Cypress, and Vetiver – resonating with the warm and sunny notes of Benzoin resins. Incredible freshness tinged with an Italian zest and the subtly aromatic green accents of Coriander.

Perfect for travelers, this set includes a 100ml and 15ml EDP.

classifications.value: The definition of INCREDIBLE, 212 VIP Black is a new addictive fragrance created to challenge, inspire and #owntheparty. 212 VIP Black makes you the focus; all eyes are on you.Enclosed in a mysterious monolithic black bottle, this explosive yet elegant fragrance is the new must-have for any modern influencer.Contrasting fierce absinthe with smooth lavender brings a confident boldness - a fearless approach - while undertones of dark musk and vanilla make for a seductively smooth execution.

classifications.value: Icon Racing is inspired by adventurous & elegant racing drivers, speeding through the British landscape in a racing green, open-top sports car. It is the fragrance of masculinity & freedom.The drumbeat of Guaiac Wood, Vetiver and Musk delivers warm & masculine base notes.With Italian Bergamot, Grapefruit and Cardamom enhancing authentic notes of black pepper and lavender, ICON Racing embodies a fresh aroma for a men that is stylish, without ever trying too hard.Contrasted FougereTOP NOTES : Bergamot, Grapefruit, CardamomMIDDLE NOTES:Orange Flower, Lavender, Fresh PepperDRY NOTES: Guaiac Wood, Vetiver, Musk

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: An intense and elegant Italian gentleman, driven by audacity and impeccable taste, made of contrasts and a unique style. Grapefruit and mandarine essences are galvanized by the dynamism of the pink pepper. The fusion of virility, shaped by the sophisticated cypress signature and the fierceness of cardamom and cinnamon. The secret of a raw addiction featuring deep and dark notes of tonka, coffee, patchouli and leather blended to create the quintessence of Italian masculinity.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Dunhill ICON Elite plays with sensual and emotional contrasts. The soul of the fragrance is constructed around a core accord of bigarade, vetiver and sandal wood.This is the signature of the fragrance. The robust spice accord of cardamom and black pepper plays with the fragrance, adding more depth and force. A heart blue sage and juniper affirms elegance and a daring combination of ebony wood in contrast to a white suede conveys a modern crafsmanship and quality of materials.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Bright and energetic, Her Blossom is a love letter to London in bloom. A walk throughsunshine-soaked parks and down blossom-covered paths, it's the embodiment of the Londoner’s attitude in those first few days of spring – high-spirited, spontaneous and full of anticipation for the season ahead. The gourmand signature of the original Eau de Parfum wrapped in luminous plum blossom notes. Sparkling mandarine, creamy sandalwood and comforting musk notes convey warmth and depth.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Vetiver’s powerful woodiness gives it the immediate appeal of uncompromising virility. In Vetyverio, it does not become totally feminine, but rather goes beyond gender. Like inlaid wood, vetiver reveals unexpected facets: sometimes fresh, other times smoky or even subtly floral. There are a kaleidoscope of olfactory nuances in this single raw material, magnified here in an unusual interpretation.Raw materials: vetiver from Java, vetiver from Haiti, grapefruitOlfactory accident: rose

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
Givenchy reveals a new vision of masculine elegance.

Here, an appreciation of tradition, benevolence, and a taste for shared pleasure, go hand in hand with daring enthusiasm and spontaneity.

A balance between unquestioned strength and confident delicacy, Gentleman Givenchy offers audacious contrasts in a woody-floral fougère.

Constructed around a floral note, interpreted in deeply masculine shades, this offbeat Eau de Toilette reveals the freshness of a pear with bite, heated up by cardamom on a base of reassuring spiced lavender. Elegance with spice! Surprise, the powdery note of the iris, is now the messenger of manly tones. In contrast, the leather-patchouli accord brings in its wake a sensual, vibrant dimension, balanced out with black vanilla. Sensual, vibrant conclusions.

The bottle, heavy glass and highly graphic, takes on a modern allure in timeless codes. Belted in black, the name stands out in white. A self-assured classic is born.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Jean Paul Gaultier pays tribute to a symbolic figure who has long been a source of inspiration for him: the sailor. Le Mâle, as virile as it is sexy, is a fragrance which offers a nonconformist view of masculinity… A reassuring fragrance with an extremely modern trail. Lavender, evoking the familiar, comforting scent of shaving soap, is enhanced by the sensuality of vanilla.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Delicate and feminine, the new Fleur de Parfum unveils the sensual intimacy of the rose – the signature of the Maison's fragrance line. A modern twist on a classic, the tenderness of the rose has been artfully combined with slightly tangy inflexions that recall the scent of raspberry. The heart of verbena flower adds a fresh and luminous verdant dimension that sublimates the luxurious rose heart, while retaining an absolute delicacy. The heart of cherry blossom diffuses milky almond notes. The bottle remains faithful to the same iconic flacon of the Maison's signature fragrance, with finely pleated glass and a hand-tied ribbon.

The fragrance reveals multiple facets: between shade and light, mystery and gleam, sensuality and freshness.The bottle is adorned with a luminescent intense pink lacquering and the cap is magnified by a white stone. The two rings remain as a symbol of the union between two people and the eternal link of the different Éclats of the family. The emblematic Plexiglas outer box seems to be enlightened from inside by the intense pink color.Top Notes: Blackcurrant, LemonHeart Notes: Night Blooming Jasmine, FreesiaBase Notes: Praline, Sandalwood

mp00050902.name: DOLCE & GABBANA The Only One EDP

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: The Only One captures the essence of sophisticated and hypnotizing femininity.The Only One’s signature lies in the surprising combination of violet and coffee giving life to an enchanting floral scent. Like the woman it represents, the fragrance is an intricate play of opposites. It is from this fusion of the unexpected, a Mocha Violet note, that it draws its appeal.The violet opens the fragrance, combining with subtle touches of bergamot to create a lively, fresh and juicy bouquet. At the heart, seductive notes of rich coffee are blended with charming iris. Finally, the warm base of vanilla and patchouli lends a tactile, comforting quality, enveloping the senses in an opulent embrace.Top Notes: Violet, BergamotHeart Notes: Coffee, Iris, Base Notes: Vanilla, Patchouli

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: The Only One captures the essence of sophisticated and hypnotizing femininity.The Only One’s signature lies in the surprising combination of violet and coffee giving life to an enchanting floral scent. Like the woman it represents, the fragrance is an intricate play of opposites. It is from this fusion of the unexpected, a Mocha Violet note, that it draws its appeal.The violet opens the fragrance, combining with subtle touches of bergamot to create a lively, fresh and juicy bouquet. At the heart, seductive notes of rich coffee are blended with charming iris. Finally, the warm base of vanilla and patchouli lends a tactile, comforting quality, enveloping the senses in an opulent embrace.Top Notes: Violet, BergamotHeart Notes: Coffee, Iris, Base Notes: Vanilla, Patchouli

mp00050958.name: Giorgio Armani Acqua di Gioia EDP 100ml

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Coach Platinum is a distinctive fragrance that speaks to a bold, daring and magnetic man.It opens with the spicy freshness of black pepper oil, rapidly contrasted by vibrant woody notes: patchouli & cashmeran and an addictive leathery vanilla accord creating a warm, sensual & elegant signature.The stunning mirrored bottle is lacquered in bright silver, giving a smooth metallic touch to the bottle.Top Notes: Black Pepper Oil, PineappleHeart Notes: Clary Sage, CashmeranBase Notes: Vanilla Leather, Patchouli

classifications.name: Description

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Coach For Men Eau De Toilette takes you on a journey of endless possibilities, evoking a sense of freedom that comes from the energy and spontaneity of New York City. Masculine yet refined, the fragrance starts with cool, fresh green Nashi pear, contrasted with spicy cardamom, and finishes with a textured vetiver base note, creating an aromatic, woody scent.

mp00051019.name: Maison Margiela Fragrances REPLICA Lazy Sunday Morning EDT 100ml

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: With its spherical vial and the image of Jeanne Lanvin and her daughter Marguerite, Éclat d'Arpège perpetuates a unique heritage, although the black Art Deco vial has now been replaced with a lighter and more flowery transparent glass sphere. Éclat d'Arpège emphasizes the green freshness of lilac, the delicacy of wisteria and peach blossom, and the generosity of Chinese osmanthus and Lebanese cedar.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: With its spherical vial and the image of Jeanne Lanvin and her daughter Marguerite, Éclat d'Arpège perpetuates a unique heritage, although the black Art Deco vial has now been replaced with a lighter and more flowery transparent glass sphere. classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: A memory from Indochina and its mountains covered by holy forests: the velvety, milky scent of sandalwood transported in logs by elephants and burned in temples. At night, the wind tempered the humidity and enhanced the rich scents of the slightly spicy wood. Yves Coueslant, one of diptyque’s founders, has never forgotten this fragrance from his childhood. A vivid memory illustrated by sandalwood from Mysore, at the forefront of this fragrance, cooled by vibrant cypress and myrtle.Raw materials: sandalwood, cedar, cypressOlfactory accident: myrtle

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: L’Homme Prada is constructed around the association of the two most emblematic ingredients of the House: iris and amber, for the first time united in a Prada masculine fragrance. They are superposed with classic ingredients of masculine perfumery reinterpreted in a modern way.

mp00051344.name: DOLCE & GABBANA The One Eau De Toilette

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Dolce&Gabbana The One Eau de Toilette is an enchanting, sensual and feminine scent, with a twist of freshness that magnifies the key note of madonna lily.More vibrantly alive than ever, the floral fragrance was captured in all its nuances by the perfumer Michel Girard, to create a new floral addiction and exalts its sensuality.The madonna lily’s white petals meet blossoms of Italian bergamot, mandarin essences, silky lychee and luscious white peach. In the heart, a bespoke essence of ylang moheli is enhanced by tender orange blossom and honeyed broom absolutes. A sensual drydown of vanilla, vetiver and musk wraps the exuberant bouquet in a sensual trail.

mp00051550.name: HUGO BOSS Boss Bottled Intense EDP

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: A headier version of the robust 'BOSS Bottled' fragrance, 'BOSS Bottled Intense' brings you crisp, clean bright apple paired with sharp, green orange blossom. Spices, woody notes and precious oils combine for a bold, powerful scent that announces a masculine point of view with calm confidence. This luxurious cologne is an ideal choice for both daytime and nighttime occasions that call for your intense persona.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: The BOSS man is primed to succeed – competitive, driven & ambitious. His daily preparation rituals are integral to his personal quest for success and BOSS Bottled has become an established part of his daily armour. BOSS Bottled is an oriental fougere fragrance. Its fresh top notes include apple and citrus fruits and are balanced in the heart, with a warm spicy middle note dominated by geranium, cinnamon and cloves. In the base notes, dry spicy scents of sandalwood, vetiver, cedarwood, olivewood, amber and musk create a distinctly masculine dry down. Boss Bottled is the encapsulation of Boss in a fragrance.

classifications.name: Description

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: COLOURS THAT SPEAK OUT.Let your lips speak out who you really are with L’Absolu Rouge. Our cult lipstick reinvents itself, more precious and colourful than ever. From our timeless iconic colours to new vibrant shades, our range has it all: perfect nudes, intense reds, luminous pinks… an incredibly widespread palette of colours and finishes to explore and adopt. Which one will you choose? MAKE-UP FINISHES TO UNCLICKClick on the rose to open and unleash the color … and the finish. For the first time, our colour range features three different make-up finishes:- SHEER: a buildable sheer colour with a subtle shiny finish- CREAM: a creamy luminous satin finish- MATTE: a comfortable creamy matte finish From effortless sheer to sophisticated cream to bold matte, there’s a lipstick to match your every mood. And, because colour is only beautiful on healthy-looking lips, all 3 textures are formulated with moisture-boosting Pro-Xylane™, for hydrated, soft and comforted lips. APPLICATION TIPS Start by lining the lips with Le Contour Pro lip pencil. Then, apply the lipstick with the brush of the pencil. For a more intense result, apply another coat of the lipstick directly on the lips.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Lipsticks continue to grow in popularity, and with the current trend of fullcoverageformulas with a demi-matte, velvety finish, we will launch 12 shades ofnew Clinique Pop Lip Colour + Primer. This rich, long-wearing, luxurious formulaconsists of our softest, creamiest texture yet and features a built-in primer for afull-shade impact. It is non-feathering and non-bleeding, so colour stays true allday. Other formula benefits include: smoothing, intense colour, and a non-waxy,non-drying consistency for comfortable wear. Clinique Pop will launch in a rangeof shades from everyday wear to bright, and will be packaged in a new, colourfulmetal case to support its fun, colourful positioning.• Prepare lips for colour with All About Lips.• To extend lipstick wear, line and fill in lips with Clinique lip liner; glide on lipstick with Lip Brush.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Guerlain has invented its first custom lipstick with a double mirror: Rouge G de Guerlain.Choose your shade and case to create your own lipstick.Guerlain has sealed intense colour and luscious lip care into a jewel formula. Enriched with plant-based polymers and sylver microcrystals with a reflective power, this exceptional formula beautifully enhances lips, cloaking them in intense and luminous long-lasting colour. Jojoba and mango butter help to nourish lips, offering them instant and lasting comfort. Hyaluronic acid and gugul resin help to smooth and plump up lips.Once again, Guerlain allows you to customize your style down to your lips, choosing from a wide range of shades, from the most nude to the most extravagant, to meet your every wish.3.5gThis is a lipstick refill only, lipstick case is required to be purchased separately.

Our new light powder technology makes this lipstick both super comfortable and highly pigmentedWant more? Have more: Intense matte, comfortable sensation, daring colors and smooth application. Dramatically matte. Dramatically intense. Dramatically you.Apply the lipstick with a brush. For a more intense result, apply another coat of the lipstick directly on the lips.

Dramatically matte. Dramatically intense. Dramatically you.Apply the lipstick with a brush. For a more intense result, apply another coat of the lipstick directly on the lips.

mp00059651.name: CLINIQUE Chubby Stick™ Moisturizing Lip Colour Balm Trio

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: The look of a liquid lipstick meets the comfortable feel of a balm and the plumped-up sheen of a gloss. Created with a superfruit blend featuring cranberry, blueberry and raspberry extracts, this emollient-rich, full-coverage formula glides on with pure color pigments and offers nourishing comfort and moisture—both instantly and over time.5mlSwipe on, press your lips together, and use the tip of the wand to perfect the edges.

mp00059534.name: ESTEE LAUDER Pure Color Envy Matte | Sculpting Lipstick

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: The look of a lipstick meets the feel of a balm for our most wearable lip yet.Loaded with crushed pigments and lip-loving ingredients, it's the ultimate swipe and go formula.Rich in Vitamins E and C and beeswax, the balmy formula glides on comfortably with a satin matte finish that leaves lips hydrated and kissably soft.Plus, it won't feather or fade for crush-worthy color that lasts all day.3.4gJust swipe, love and go.One swipe delivers a blotted-down look.Layer two or three more swipes for more intense color payoff.

mp00035891.name: AUSTRALIS TAG TEAM BROW PENCIL & GEL

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: This 2-in-1 brow pencil is all you need to create the perfect brow with its slanted triangular tip to let you naturally define your brows and the clear strong-hold gel to tame unruly brows and set them.What is it?This 2-in-1 brow pencil is all you need to create the perfect brow with its slanted triangular tip to let you naturally define your brows and the clear strong-hold gel to tame unruly brows and set them. Why we ♥ itThe soft and creamy brow formula in the mechanical pencil lets you create naturally defined brows and also requires no sharpening! The clear brow gel and spoolie lets you set everything in place.

mp00047554.name: Lancôme Hypnôse Doll Eyes Waterproof Mascara

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Sculpt, shape and define your arches with this innovative 3-in-1 brow tool.On one end, a unique triangular tip pencil fills and contours brows with a custom thin or thick stroke.In the center, a sponge-tip applicator primed with brow powder creates fullness and depth.Style and set your brow look with the spooled brush.Step 1: GroomBrush brow hairs up and out using the spooled brush to assess natural brow hair pattern.Step 2: FillFill in using pencil.With brush, sweep color out and downward to shape the arch and elongate the tail.Step 3: Set Using brow powder applicator, lightly press sponge tip over length of brow to set pencil and add dimension.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Sculpt, shape and define your arches with this innovative 3-in-1 brow tool.On one end, a unique triangular tip pencil fills and contours brows with a custom thin or thick stroke.In the center, a sponge-tip applicator primed with brow powder creates fullness and depth.Style and set your brow look with the spooled brush.Step 1: GroomBrush brow hairs up and out using the spooled brush to assess natural brow hair pattern.Step 2: FillFill in using pencil.With brush, sweep color out and downward to shape the arch and elongate the tail.Step 3: Set Using brow powder applicator, lightly press sponge tip over length of brow to set pencil and add dimension.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: A brow styler multitasking pencil and powder for soft, full, natural-looking brows.Fill and define brows with the pencil then layer powder on top or wear each alone to achieve different brow looks.For a feathered effect, apply the powder throughout the brow, then use the wax-pencil to draw diagonal strokes that mimic brow hair and brush upwards.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: An all-new, multidimensional metallic eye shadow formula designed to give eyes instant incandescence.In three new lustre, metal and sparkle finishes, this molten shadow can be applied dry for instant impact or applied with a damp brush for a liquid metal look. Rich Lustre: This finish delivers high-impact sparkle. Rich Metal: This finish delivers a molten foil effect. Rich Sparkle: This finish delivers super-charged sparkle.Sweep or smudge across eyelid for instant impact, and layer shades and textures to create a range of standout looks.To intensify, dampen brush before picking up shadow.Try combining wet and dry application for added dimension—just allow wet shadow to dry before adding another layer.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: You’ve never seen a sparkly shadow this sophisticated. Urban Decay’s Moondust Eyeshadow is dazzlingly sparkly but with a super refined, incredibly sophisticated feel (and not a single speck of chunky glitter). Microfine bits of iridescent sparkle collide with intense, dreamy hues and lush, 3-D metallics—for an effect that’s out of this world.New technology gives Moondust an amazing effect not found in traditional pressed-powder shadows. It feels like a cream but goes on like a powder to create a smooth, brilliantly reflective look. The result? Sexy, twinkling sparkle with a ton of depth and movement. (And a LOT of questions about what you’re wearing!)Want an even more dramatic effect? For extra intense color payout, apply Moondust wet, then blend out the edges with a dry brush.

mp00049272.name: POLA B.A Colors Eyebrow Pencil Refill

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: ・Please use it with B. A COLORS Eyebrow Pencil Refill (product sold separately). [How to set the refill cartridge] Fully insert the refill cartridge into the holder until they make a clicking sound. Note: If you hear a clicking sound while turning the axis and the pencil does not appear, it means that the cartridge is empty. Please replace it with a new one. Note: Hold the tip of the refill cartridge and pull it out of the holder to replace it with a new one.Turn the axis and allow about 2-3mm of the pencil to stick out from the cartridge before use. (1) Use the attached brush that comes with the holder to comb your eyebrows along your natural brow line. (2) Move the shorter tip of the pencil to define the brows along their natural lines. (3) To complete, use the attached brush on the holder to blend the lines for a natural dimensional look. (4) The pencil has a built-in sharpener on the end, towards the base of the brush. Please detach the cap from the brush and take the sharpener out of the pencil before use. Turn the V side of the sharpener upwards and sharpen your pencil by sliding the shorter tip forward.　Please be careful not to make them too sharp.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: The new fragrances from Tiffany & Co., Tiffany & Love Eau de Toilette for Him and Tiffany & Love Eau de Parfum for Her, were created as a tribute to modern love.Inspired by the connections that create a bond between two people, both fragrances share a common ingredient, blue sequoia. This vibrant woody note unifies the two scents.Crafted by renowned perfumers Sophie Labbé and Nicolas Beaulieu, Tiffany & Love for Him is a citrusy, aromatic fragrance with a wood-infused base. An enticing composition, the scent begins with oils of ginger, mandarin and cardamom. At the heart is a juniper-cypress blend, a co-distillation process created exclusively for Tiffany, which brings a sense of modernity to the fragrance. Sandalwood, vetiver and the common ingredient of the duo, the signature blue sequoia note, complete the base of this masterful composition.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Luscious lotus flowers skim the surface of a shimmering pond in the ancient Hanging Gardens. Their delicate water-splashed petals glide down the shaded walkways, sweeping over the plump, juicy figs that punctuate the bountiful trees. This light floral fragrance is brought together with neroli to capture the essence of a luxuriant landscape.

classifications.name: How to apply
classifications.value: Suitable to spray on pulse points. You may use the fragrance on its own or combine it with another scent to create a scent that is uniquely yours.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
6.5ml
A long-wear liquid eyeshadow that delivers crease-proof, vibrant eye color in a comfortable, creamy formula.

Playful and intense, this long-lasting eyeshadow combines the purity of a powder, the staying power of an ink, and the feel of a cream for 16-hours of staying power. Eye Tint is now available in 17 colors and 4 finishes for multiuse application.

Discover Eye Tint, the new liquid eyeshadow by Giorgio Armani Beauty. This innovative formula transforms from liquid to solid, instantly adhering to the eyelid for 16 hours of smudge and crease-proof color.

The formula features a hold booster - a creamy polymer with glycerine - that allows pure color pigments to blend together seamlessly on the lid. The Eye Tint is also infused with a color vibrancy booster, which is enriched with natural pigments and pearls for vibrant, long-lasting color. The unique complex works together to disperse high-density color evenly. All of the Eye Tint shades feature dynamic runway-inspired colors that can be used as eyeshadow, eyeline, highlighter, or layered for natural to glamorous looks
Use the Backstage tip of the applicator to apply as eyeliner & the flat side to apply as eyeshadow.
You can aslo put Eye Tint on your cheek for an highlight touch.
Shades can be layered and easily blended for different results.

Backstage tip:
Apply lighter shades alone to highlight the eyes.
Complete the eye make up with Eyes to Kill Mascara for definition and volume.

Can also be applied with the fingertips for a natural result or an angled eye brush for a more sophisticated look. Finer, Faster, Forever.

classifications.value: A thin layer of powdered emulsion covering the surface of the skin while retaining moisture inside the skin.Mixed angle squales and plant extracts are moist and healthy.PractIcIng holes, colors and wrinkles, creating uncomplemented natural sense, and the skin long duration is elegant and transparent.Use after cleansing your skin with lotion and serum, or after applying your makeup base. Take a small amount with a finger, sponge, brush, etc. and stretch it from the center of the face to the outside. Then press down with a sponge to remove excess foundation. If you use an enriching powder to finish, you can maintain a well-prepared skin surface for a longer time while keeping it moist.

mp00047726.name: ESTEE LAUDER Advanced Night Repair | Concentrated Recovery Eye Mask

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: A revolution in repair for fresh, youthful-looking eyes.Starting tonight, rejuvenate the look and feel of your eyes after the stresses of modern life—from long days to lack of sleep, even pollution. Our Worldwide First: the only Eye Mask infused with Advanced Night Repair technology. Fine, dry lines are plumped as skin is drenched with hydration.Instantly, your eye area feels cool and refreshed. In just 10 minutes, eyes look more rested, renewed—awake with fresh, luminous youth. In fact, a stunning 99% of women who tried it felt it left their eye area looking more radiant. It's tested on Asian women in Asia. And the women who tried it loved the immediate results*:• 99% said their eyes looked more radiant• 99% felt calm and soothed• 96% felt hydrated*Consumer testing on 101 women.Apply on clean skin, once a week at night. Press liquid chamber to break seal and release formula onto pads, then massage gently to ensure pads are fully saturated. Tear open packette and separate the pads (discarding the divider), then apply one under each eye. Leave on for 10 minutes, remove pads and gently pat in any remaining serum. If desired, follow with your favorite eye creme.

classifications.value: A revolutionary new lip product! Rouge Pur Couture Vernis à Lèvres Glossy Stain combines the texture and shine of a gloss with the long-wear of a stain for a truly innovative lip product. A lightweight texture that immediately melts onto lips. Rouge Pur Couture Vernis à Lèvres Glossy Stain delivers intense glossy colour for an extremely long lasting new kind of shine. The applicator’s unique slanted tip and short soft bristles allow for flawless application with perfect precision.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: CREAMY. SATURATED. LONG-LASTING.AN ARRAY OF TOM FORD’S ESSENTIAL SHADES OF LUXURIOUS LIPSTICK FOR THE MANY DIMENSIONS OF THE TOM FORD WOMAN. TOM FORD’S PERSONAL PALETTE OF LUXURIOUS LIP COLORS FOR THE MANY DIMENSIONS AND SHADES OF THE TOM FORD WOMAN. FROM BARE NUDE TO FIRE RED TO DEEP BROWN, EACH SHADE REPRESENTS FORD’S MODERN IDEAL OF AN ESSENTIAL MAKEUP SHADE. RARE AND EXOTIC INGREDIENTS INCLUDING SOJA SEED EXTRACT, BRAZILIAN MURUMURU BUTTER AND CHAMOMILLA FLOWER OIL CREATE AN ULTRA-CREAMY TEXTURE WITH AN INCREDIBLY SMOOTH APPLICATION. SPECIALLY TREATED COLOR PIGMENTS ARE BLENDED TO DELIVER PURE COLOR WITH THE PERFECT BALANCE OF LUMINOSITY FOR A POLISHED FINISH.APPLY ON BARE LIPS OR USE A LIP BRUSH FOR A POLISHED, SOPHISTICATED LOOK.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Unexpected color. Unapologetic collection. Let your lips lead the way. Introducing a new lineup of Lipstick inspired by the revolutionary vision of Francois Nars. Bring on bolds and brights for groundbreaking style; expose yourselfwith seductive nudes that leave nothing to hide. Dynamic blend of Moringa and Passion Fruit Seed Oils enhances color vibrancy and conditions lips for radically lightweight wear and unprecedented feel. Endlessartistry. Infinite expression3.5g

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Discover Matte Glow Compact, the new generation of foundation that perfects the complexion with a luminous matte finish all day long. Its innovative second-skin formula unifies the complexion with undetectable high coverage, for a natural result.Featuring iconic Burberry check, the Matte Glow Compact can be used alone in the morning or as a touch-up during the day.Specifically created to ensure a sensorial application, its luxurious sponge delivers the right amount of powder for a perfectly even result with a weightless feel. Available in six shades.15gApply Matte Glow Compact with the soft sponge from the centre of the face and blend outwards. For touch-ups, dab gently with the soft sponge on the T-zone, cheeks, chin, and around the nose.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: CLUTCH-SIZED. DISCREET. EXCITING.TO TOM FORD, THERE IS NO MORE DRAMATIC ACCESSORY THAN A PERFECT LIP. IT IS THE FOCUS OF THE FACE AND IT HAS THE POWER TO DEFINE A WOMAN’S WHOLE LOOK. THE COLLECTION SHOWCASES A DECADENT WARDROBE OF 50 RICH, VIVACIOUS, SENSUOUS SHADES THAT INFLUENCE A MOOD AND TRANSFORM AN ENTIRE LOOK FOR MAXIMUM IMPACT. RARE AND EXOTIC INGREDIENTS INCLUDING SOJA SEED EXTRACT, BRAZILIAN MURUMURU BUTTER AND CHAMOMILLA FLOWER OIL CREATE AN ULTRA-CREAMY TEXTURE WITH AN INCREDIBLY SMOOTH APPLICATION. SPECIALLY TREATED COLOR PIGMENTS ARE BLENDED TO DELIVER PURE COLOR WITH JUST THE RIGHT BALANCE OF LUMINOSITY.MAY BE APPLIED DIRECTLY TO THE LIPS FROM THE BULLET OR WITH LIP BRUSH.BOYS: LAYER A METALLIC BOY OVER ANY BOYS & GIRLS FORMULA.GIRLS: LAYER LIP COLOR SHEER OVER OR UNDER ANY BOYS & GIRLS FORMULA.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: CLUTCH-SIZED. DISCREET. EXCITING.TO TOM FORD, THERE IS NO MORE DRAMATIC ACCESSORY THAN A PERFECT LIP. IT IS THE FOCUS OF THE FACE AND IT HAS THE POWER TO DEFINE A WOMAN’S WHOLE LOOK. THE COLLECTION SHOWCASES A DECADENT WARDROBE OF 50 RICH, VIVACIOUS, SENSUOUS SHADES THAT INFLUENCE A MOOD AND TRANSFORM AN ENTIRE LOOK FOR MAXIMUM IMPACT. RARE AND EXOTIC INGREDIENTS INCLUDING SOJA SEED EXTRACT, BRAZILIAN MURUMURU BUTTER AND CHAMOMILLA FLOWER OIL CREATE AN ULTRA-CREAMY TEXTURE WITH AN INCREDIBLY SMOOTH APPLICATION. SPECIALLY TREATED COLOR PIGMENTS ARE BLENDED TO DELIVER PURE COLOR WITH JUST THE RIGHT BALANCE OF LUMINOSITY.MAY BE APPLIED DIRECTLY TO THE LIPS FROM THE BULLET OR WITH LIP BRUSH.BOYS: LAYER A METALLIC BOY OVER ANY BOYS & GIRLS FORMULA.GIRLS: LAYER LIP COLOR SHEER OVER OR UNDER ANY BOYS & GIRLS FORMULA.

mp00056299.name: Yves Saint Laurent Rouge Volupté Shine

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Introducing Rouge Volupté Shine. Give in to the temptation of dazzling color. Succumb to a unique sensorial experience with extreme comfort and luminous shine. Hyaluronic acid microspheres help seal in moisture for 8 hours of hydration. Anti-oxidants and emollients help condition and soften lips.

mp00056450.name: LA PRAIRIE Skin Caviar Concealer Foundation SPF 15

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: COMPLEXION PERFECTIONNatural-looking colour perfects the complexion in this dewy foundation and exquisitely matched concealer, infused with caviar extract. The luxurious cream emulsion offers full coverage and the concealer camouflages under-eye darkness and deeper imperfections.The flawless finish to your Skin Caviar ritual. Start with Skin Caviar Essence-in-Lotion, followed by Skin Caviar Liquid Lift, Skin Caviar Luxe Cream and Skin Caviar Luxe Eye Lift Cream.BENEFITSHelps support skin's firmnesss and elasticityNatural-looking coverage of under-eye darkness and imperfectionsEXPERIENCE perfect skin with this dewy pair of complexion enhancers.Foundation: Shake well. Smooth over face and blend for desired coverage.Concealer: Pat onto skin with fingertip, over or under foundation. Use brush to blend.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: An ultra-luxurious, medium-coverage foundation that blurs imperfections leaving skin perfectly even-toned, luminous and cashmere to the touch. Developed from unprecedented skincare science, this lightweight foundation contains radiance-boosting exclusive Illuminating Complex EX which moisturizes, rejuvenates, retexturizes and visibly repairs environmental skin damage for smoothing, radiant coverage.Apply following skincare or the application of primer.Use the spatula provided, apply foundation to five points (forehead, nose, chin and both cheeks) on face.Smooth the foundation over your cheek with two or three circular motions, working upward and outward until evenly blended. Apply to the other cheek in the same manner. Complete the application by smoothing foundation over your forehead and nose and around the eyes.Follow with concealer and set with translucent loose powder or refining pressed powder.Contains the signature skincare ingredient Illuminating Complex EX to diminish the appearance of damage caused by dryness and to bring visible improvement to skin by providing hydration and a smooth refined texture.Unique gel-oil base brings out the natural beauty of skin and blurs imperfections rather than covering them with powders leaving you with a soft focus finish.Reduces visible signs of dryness and the appearance of fine lines while promoting an appearance of firmness and resilience.Features a smooth texture and inspires an indulgent feeling that parallels the application of a luxurious skincare cream.Maintains beautiful coverage and keeps skin looking smooth and refined all day long.Replenishes moisture all day long and minimizes imperfections attributed to visible signs of aging for more beautiful, youthful-looking skin.Delivers noticeable retexturizing effects with continued use.Formulated with ingredients that protect the natural beauty of skin and help defend against the visible signs of aging that are caused by UV rays, dryness and oxidation.Formulated with a fragrance of natural rose essence that inspires feelings of elegance and luxury.BROAD SPECTRUM SPF 21DERMATOLOGIST TESTED

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: A glowing, natural radiant finish foundation with sheer and buildable coverage that immaculately evens skin tone. Replete with skincare benefits and the NARS Complexion Brightening Formula, it leaves skin hydrated, more luminous, softer and smoother. Used daily, Sheer Glow Foundation improves the skin's brightness and texture.For normal, normal-to-dry and dry skin typesHydrates for softer and smoother skinContains powerful anti-oxidants to protect against damaging free radicals and turmeric extract to improve skin's radiance and toneStreamlined packaging with ergonomic twist cap.Dermatologist tested. Non-comedogenic. Fragrance free.

mp00058095.name: GIORGIO ARMANI Designer Shaping Cream Foundation

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Designed to look and feel like skin, this award-winning foundation is formulated with a unique transparent base and skin tone correct pigments for the most natural-looking, skin-like finish. A Bobbi Brown original, the innovative formula features Smart Technology for targeted moisturization or oil control depending on what skin needs. Delivers medium to full coverage and comes in a convenient swivel-up stick for at home and on-the-go application.From its creamy yet lightweight texture to its water-, sweat- and humidity-resistant wear, Skin Foundation Stick is a cult-favorite for a reason. Here's why fans love it:- 96% found it mimicked the look of healthy skin tone, and 94% the look of healthy skin texture.- 96% said that it left skin feeling moisturized.- 95% found that it helped control oil and shine.- 97% said that it was long-wearing.- 97% found that it helped even skin tone and soften the appearance of lines and wrinkles.Weightless formulas blends in seamlessly for coverage that looks like skin, not makeup. Formulated with a blend of emollients like Olive Extract and Shea Butter, the formula intensely moisturizes (and locks moisture in) wherever skin is dry. Light diffusing powders and oil-controlling minerals perfect the appearance of skin while offering target oil and shine control.9gAfter moisturizing skin, lightly apply across forehead, cheeks, nose, and chin. Blend with fingertips, sponge, or the Foundation Brush (sold separately). Build coverage as desired.

Formulated with a blend of emollients like Olive Extract and Shea Butter, the formula intensely moisturizes (and locks moisture in) wherever skin is dry. Light diffusing powders and oil-controlling minerals perfect the appearance of skin while offering target oil and shine control.9gAfter moisturizing skin, lightly apply across forehead, cheeks, nose, and chin. Blend with fingertips, sponge, or the Foundation Brush (sold separately). Build coverage as desired.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: For those who prefer timeless glamour to all-out flash, matte reigns supreme. M∙A∙C introduces a twist on this classic texture with robustly saturated shades of Retro Matte Liquid Lipcolour. Whichever shade you choose, all promise one thing: a splash of colour in a liquid-suede finish that is impossible to forget.- Apply to lips using the edge of the applicator for a smooth, sharp shape. Use the tip of the applicator to perfect your application.- For a diffused look, try blending the edges of the lip with a 219 Brush before the liquid lipcolour dries.- Use over Prep & Prime Lip for ultimate comfort.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Love at first swipe! Fall in love with an argan oil-infused formula that delivers an instant hit of powerful colour and all-day moisture. The True-Colour Gelled System of ultra-refined pure pigments evenly disperses bright, smooth colour for high-impact one-swipe payoff. A combination of lightweight oils and specialized waxes makes this lipstick feel luxurious, super-silky and barely there. The ultra-gliding formula lays down beautifully in a thin film for a creamy and conditioning texture. With a weightless feel and satin-soft finish, Love Me Lipstick loves you back.•Apply directly to lips as desired.•For non-bleeding colour, prep lips with Prep + Prime Lip.•Apply with a 318 Brush for extra precision.

mp00056668.name: GIORGIO ARMANI Lasting Silk UV Fluid Foundation

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: From textiles to cosmetics: Inspired by a new high-tech silk fine milling process, this water-based matte foundation fuses a soft, 14-hour velvet texture and SPF 20 UV protection, for a long-lasting fresh appearance.

mp00057321.name: CLE DE PEAU Luminizing Face Enhancer

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: This exquisite highlighting powder uses innovative light-diffusing technology to define contours and illuminate your complexion.●Enhances the natural beauty of skin with a dramatically lustrous makeup finish.●Created with a rich texture that glides on smoothly and enlivens skin with an infusion of light.●DERMATOLOGIST-TESTED.●Apply as the last step in your makeup routine.●Sweep brush back and forth over surface of powder and apply to face in an upward motion across cheekbones. For more dramatic radiance, use additional powder at temples.●When replacement powder is needed, refill the compact with Clé de Peau Beauté Luminizing Face Enhancer Refill (sold separately).●Retain the clear film over powder to avoid transfer of powder onto mirror.

mp00050570.name: ORIGINS Checks And Balances™ Frothy Face Wash

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Our clever cleanser balances faces with dry and oily places. This gentle, frothy face wash with Broad Leaf Kelp Extract, Wheat Protein and Tourmaline discourages excess oil production while protecting dry prone zones. Plus the aroma of Bergamot, Spearmint and Lavender refreshes. Skin feels comfortably clean. Never tight, pulled or parched.When it comes to faces that are both dry and oily, it takes a clever cleanser to balance the two. This gentle, frothy face wash carefully does both jobs without canceling each other out. Skin feels comfortably refreshed after cleansing—never tight, pulled, or parched. Great for all skin types, it’s enriched with aromatic bergamot, spearmint, and lavender to add pleasure to the process.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: An intelligent, luminizing foundation that infuses fresh hydration and sychronizes with skin for a healthy brilliant glow. Intuitively beautiful. Like it belongs to your skin.TO USE:Shake well. Apply after skincare, smoothing on evenly from the center of the face outward. Build your desired coverage level with additional layers.

mp00056306.name: TOM FORD BEAUTY Lip Lacquer Luxe Matte

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Soft-Matte. Transfer-Resistant. Longwear.Tom Ford elevates liquid lipstick in a rich, transfer-resistant soft-matte formula. Intense, saturated color coats lips with supple, longwearing comfort. Pigment- maximizing technology envelops concentrated pigments in ultra-cushion-like emollients, creating smooth, second-skin film on lips. 10 liquid mattes paint on mineral powder-infused, crease-free color, from the playful berry of Habitual to the commanding reds of Jaguar and Overpower.Use applicator tip to apply color onto lips for desired look. Allow to dry.

mp00055812.name: Yves Saint Laurent Rouge Pur Couture The Slim Sheer Matte #112

mp00055443.name: GIVENCHY Matissime Velvet Radiant Mat Fluid Foundation SPF 20 PA+++

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
An extremely soft and velvety powder that neutralizes shine to reveal a lastingly matte complexion. True color and a lightweight sensation for a natural result and absolute comfort.

Ultra-matte technology

-the airy structure of silica microspheres ensure an absolute matte finish:

- their ability to capture water and sebum gives them up to three times more absorbency than classic powders.

- Composed of multiple micro-canals, they offer a unique sensation of lightness, allowing the skin to breathe.

Simultaneously, a natural ingredient absorbs excess sebum and moisture to help the skin maintain its balance for controlled shine. ColorIntact correcting pigments, protected by a
silica coating, work to preserve the radiance of the complexion and extend color hold.


Refines, protects and evens-out skin tone:

Matissime Velvet is enriched with Black Cumin oil which is renowned for its purifying benefits. The skin is protected and its pure beauty revealed.


A radiant matte result for a velvet complexion

Freed from excess oil and humidity, the skin benefits from a long lasting, naturally matte finish. Hour after hour, color stays true, without darkening. The complexion is even-toned, shine-free and luminous. Imperfections are concealed. The skin’s texture is smoothed and the appearance of pores is reduced. The skin breathes freely. Its natural radiance is preserved.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Choose your shade and your case to create your own lipstick. Every woman is unique so Guerlain brings you the ultimate luxury of customizable lips. Discover Rouge G de Guerlain, the first jewel lipstick to customize to your style. Create your lipstick: 1. First, choose your lipstick from a wide range of shades to match your look: from the most nude to the most extravagant, and with different finishes from satin to matte. 2. Choose your case from an array of styles – from the most timeless to the most trendy – to create your complete lipstick and IT-accessory. 3. Customize your lipstick. Discover the new IT-COLOR collection and collect countless versions of Rouge G de Guerlain! For this exceptional lipstick, Guerlain has sealed luscious lip care and intense colour into a jewel formula for instant and lasting comfort. Your lips are infused with luminous, long-wear colour.3.5gStep 1. Choose a color. Step 2. Choose a case. Step 3. My own lipstick is completed!This is a lipstick refill only, lipstick case is required to be purchased separately.

mp00055759.name: GIVENCHY Prisme Blush Powder Blush Duo Highlight

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
Prisme Blush lets you sculpt and color your cheekbones with just one step.



A pair of colors representing softness and energy forms two halves of a harmonious whole. Highlight and pure color finishes contrast each other.



The lighter shade is packed with radiance to highlight your facial features naturally; use it as a base to apply and diffuse the second shade. The more intense shade adds color to create a fresh, healthy glow.



These two colors, whether used alone, blended together for contouring, or layered on top of each other, can be applied in as many different ways as there are facial expressions.

"02 Love" duo of colors: pearly light pink to highlight; intense and matte fuchsia to color.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Don't let dry undereyes and dark shadows get you down. Boi-ing hydrating concealer hides dark circles and visibly smooths fine lines. Plus with Vitamin E & apple seed extract, this hydra-smoothing formula keeps skin hydrated for 6 hours!* (Formerly known as fakeup. Same shades, same great formula!)*instrumental test on 10 panellists Sheer coverage Lightweight formula Concealer stick Natural finish 100% said it hydrates skin**3.5gStart with a stroke of boi-ing hydrating concealer under each eye. Using your bling finger, pat gently outward to hide dark circles and fine lines. For extra hydration, conceal dry patches and imperfections all over the face.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Discover our High Coverage Liquid Concealer to conceal, cover and contour in one stroke. The thin and stretchable formula delivers a second skin feel that instantly blurs away imperfections, from dark circles to redness to blemishes. This concealer can be used alone for a lighter makeup finish or combined with Power Fabric foundation for a perfect flawless look. Either way, enjoy a concealer that blends easily and remains comfortable and fresh on the skin throughout the day.6mlMULTI-USAGE APPLICATOR: Use the pointy tip for targeted retouching Use the flat surface for larger-zone concealing and covering

The thin and stretchable formula delivers a second skin feel that instantly blurs away imperfections, from dark circles to redness to blemishes. This concealer can be used alone for a lighter makeup finish or combined with Power Fabric foundation for a perfect flawless look. Either way, enjoy a concealer that blends easily and remains comfortable and fresh on the skin throughout the day.6mlMULTI-USAGE APPLICATOR: Use the pointy tip for targeted retouching Use the flat surface for larger-zone concealing and covering

mp00053152.name: Shu Uemura Unlimited Breathable Lasting Concealer

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Unlimited stretchable lasting concealer is tailor made for Asian skin tones. Use it in multiple ways to conceal, perfect, beautify, and enhance facial features for an ideal complexion.Unlimited stretchable lasting concealer has a lightweight liquid texture that effortlessly blends with your skin. The stretchable formula holds pigments in place, ensuring coverage and an even finish. Infused with Japanese rice-extracts, it prevents dullness of color and gives you a moisture feel to your skin.7mlApply concealer to conceal spot and acne, dark circle; enhance face contour and features. Gently blend the concealer to the skin to create a perfect complexion.

mp00055729.name: KOSE Sekkisei White BB Cream Moist

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Use this BB Cream alone after applying lotion to achieve a translucent, natural “no-makeup” look with ease. The BB Cream provides natural coverage on dark spots and dullness while caring for the skin to leave it plump, moisturized, brightened and radiant. Designed to multi-task as a serum, emulsion, cream, sunscreen, primer and foundation. Enriched with “Highly-Permeating Melting Snow Oil” that instantly permeates deeply into the epidermis to leave disrupted skin grain plump. Enriched with “Super Moisturizing Melting Snow Polymer” that carries moisture. Leaves the skin hydrated and maintains moisture. Enriched with “Snowflake Powder” that creates an airy, soft radiance with an exquisite soft-focus effect. Provides natural coverage on dark spots and freckles to achieve both excellent coverage and a no-makeup look. The color won’t darken even when the product comes into contact with sebum and the cream maintains a flawless complexion.Spreads evenly without streaks even when applied quickly for a flawless finish. Leaves the skin moisturized yet not feeling sticky. Comfortably spreads over the skin with a lightweight, smooth touch to correct the appearance of pores, uneven surfaces and tones.Enriched with oriental herbal extracts. Thoroughly replenishes moisture during the day to care for dullness caused by dehydration to prevent skin’s dryness and flaking.The UV blocking effect protects the skin against damage caused by UV rays, and prevents dark spots and freckles caused by sunburn.

mp00058055.name: ESTÉE LAUDER Double Wear | Cushion BB All Day Wear Liquid Compact SPF 50/PA++++

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Lasts all day, no touch-ups needed.A long-wearing cushion compact makeup with 8-hour lasting power. Protects with high level SPF.The lightweight, BB fresh, moisture-infused formula is comfortable and so lightweight, it’s easy to build coverage and keep a natural radiant look.The appearance of pores, fine lines and imperfections is minimized. Skin looks smooth, hydrated, flawless.For all skintypes. Oil-free. Controls oil and shine.Included sponge applicator.Refillable.Apply after your skincare regimen.Press sponge applicator into cushion, pat onto face and smooth out to blend.Repeat to build coverage.Close compact tightly after each use.To Clean SpongeWash gently with mild soap and warm water.Lay on a flat surface to air dry.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: This ultra-fine pencil fills in the blanks with incredibly natural-looking, hair-like strokes. The formula is perfectly balanced; it’s not too hard and not too soft, yet easy to get the perfect amount of payoff and precision.0.04gHold the brow pencil by the custom control grip. Start at the base of the brow and use tiny hair-like flicks; light, short, upward strokes to draw in the direction of your natural hair growth.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Everyone is an expert with this super easy filling & shaping eyebrow pencil. It features a custom, non-sharpen "goof-proof" tip, soft colour and a glide-on formula for easy & fast brow filling. Comes complete with built-in blending spoolie-brush and signature Tips & Tricks.1. Use the wide part of the custom goof-proof tip to fill & shape brows.2. Build colour with a couple of strokes.3. Use the pointed edge to define the "tail" of the brow.4. Blend with the spoolie-brush for that "real life" brow magic.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Lancome's Brow Define Pencil is a waterproof and budge-proof long-lasting brow pencil that grips skin to create shape where there is missing hair. Featuring a micro-mechanical design, it gives arches extreme accuracy, precision, and evenness with its ultrafine tip and comb. The precision tip creates the appearance of actual brow hair for natural-looking, balanced and perfectly defined eyebrows.Define Your Eyebrows in 2 Steps 1. Draw short upward strokes to mimic hairs and fill in sparse eyebrow areas 2. Blend with the spoolie brush for a natural yet defined look

mp00054854.name: YVES SAINT LAURENT Touche Eclat High Cover

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: WHAT IS IT?A radiant high coverage concealer that instantly conceals dark circles for an awakened look. Cover all, look natural.WHAT IT DOES? Conceal dark circles : highly pigmented, this liquid radiant concealer instantly conceals dark circles. Improve the fatigue look: multi-active blend including ruscus extract, soothing Moroccan calendula extract and energizing caffeine. Infused with antioxidant Vitamin E to deliver essential antioxidant protection to help protect skin against damaging free radicals. Longwear and crease-proof. Natural luminous finish in one stroke.Apply TOUCHE ECLAT HIGH COVER using the brush applicator to the areas you wish to cover. To conceal, choose a color close to or one shade lighter than your skin tone. Tip: you can use Touche eclat high cover on your eyelids as a base to create a perfect canvas for your smokey eyes.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
The foundation that fully restores your complexion's youthful glow. Instantly restore a glowing radiant complexion with this new Skin Tone Optimizing complex. 
Conceals age spots and imperfections. Contains extracts of Chicory and Red Jania extracts that help optimise the skin's luminosity and radiance. 
Day after day, your skin is firmer, plumped, smooth and radiant.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
Gucci begins its new beauty story from the lips. A lipstick is the ultimate makeup tool, its fascination and desirability a result of its instant transformative power. Gucci’s three new lipstick collections are diverse formulations: Rouge à Lèvres Satin with a satin finish, Rouge à Lèvres Voile with a sheer finish, and Baume à Lèvres, a lip balm with a translucent finish.
Rouge à Lèvres Satin is a creamy with intense colour lipstick. The formula delivers a perfect and long-lasting satin finish, that leaves lips smooth and soft, and is lightweight with a comfortable feel. The 36 shades sweep from nudes to reds to pinks, with nuances of orange and purple and an unexpected black hue.
Inspired by vintage makeup the lipsticks’ packaging interweaves House motifs with contemporary codes. Packaged in a gold tube, Rouge à Lèvres Satin is etched with a decorative style drawn by Alessandro Michele that borrows its flair from Art Deco inspirations.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
Gucci begins its new beauty story from the lips. A lipstick is the ultimate makeup tool, its fascination and desirability a result of its instant transformative power. Gucci’s three new lipstick collections are diverse formulations: Rouge à Lèvres Satin with a satin finish, Rouge à Lèvres Voile with a sheer finish, and Baume à Lèvres, a lip balm with a translucent finish.
Rouge à Lèvres Satin is a creamy with intense colour lipstick. The formula delivers a perfect and long-lasting satin finish, that leaves lips smooth and soft, and is lightweight with a comfortable feel. The 36 shades sweep from nudes to reds to pinks, with nuances of orange and purple and an unexpected black hue.
Inspired by vintage makeup the lipsticks’ packaging interweaves House motifs with contemporary codes. Packaged in a gold tube, Rouge à Lèvres Satin is etched with a decorative style drawn by Alessandro Michele that borrows its flair from Art Deco inspirations.

Inspired by vintage makeup the lipsticks’ packaging interweaves House motifs with contemporary codes. Packaged in a gold tube, Rouge à Lèvres Satin is etched with a decorative style drawn by Alessandro Michele that borrows its flair from Art Deco inspirations.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
Gucci begins its new beauty story from the lips. A lipstick is the ultimate makeup tool, its fascination and desirability a result of its instant transformative power. Gucci’s three new lipstick collections are diverse formulations: Rouge à Lèvres Satin with a satin finish, Rouge à Lèvres Voile with a sheer finish, and Baume à Lèvres, a lip balm with a translucent finish.
Rouge à Lèvres Satin is a creamy with intense colour lipstick. The formula delivers a perfect and long-lasting satin finish, that leaves lips smooth and soft, and is lightweight with a comfortable feel. The 36 shades sweep from nudes to reds to pinks, with nuances of orange and purple and an unexpected black hue.
Inspired by vintage makeup the lipsticks’ packaging interweaves House motifs with contemporary codes. Packaged in a gold tube, Rouge à Lèvres Satin is etched with a decorative style drawn by Alessandro Michele that borrows its flair from Art Deco inspirations.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
A highly translucent foundation with a light, thin texture while not compromising for its concealing effect to cover blemishes. The carefully designed foundation brush ensures an even, nimble application, achieving a seamless and hydrated makeup foundation.

Product Benefits:
• Utilizing the all-new Ultimate Glow Technology and Glow Gold Pearl Powder, as well as the Lighting Formula and Light Reflective Auto Correcting Technology of IPSA’s foundation collections, skin reflects light from all angles, creating a thin, glossy texture while concealing all blemishes. Its lightweight texture also minimizes stress of the skin.
• Waterproof and sweat-proof, it is formulated with the Hydrophobizing Processing Technique that prevents makeup from falling off or discoloration, creating a long-lasting foundation.
• The water-drop-shaped foundation brush is designed for even application to areas such as nose wings or eye circles. The soft brush, mixed with straight and curly hair, allows easy creation of thin, delicate foundation with long-lasting effect.
• Formulated with Amino DF EX and Argan oil, it revitalizes skin cells to create a hydrating foundation.
16g
Take suitable amount with the brush apply on face then spread outward evenly from the centre. Apply remaining powder on the forehead, around the eyes, nose and lips. Use appropriate amount for best UV protection and coverage.

mp00055222.name: LA PRAIRIE Skin Caviar Essence-in-Foundation SPF 25

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: The exquisite formulation of Skin Caviar Essence-in-Foundation is a first-of-its-kind blend. Caviar Water captures the most delicate components of caviar in a pure, potent, highly concentrated infusion. An SPF 25 provides a high level of sun protection, while PA+++ guards specifically against UVA, the rays responsible for premature aging of the skin. The result of this alliance between science and beauty is a fluid, hydrating emulsion that provides natural-looking complexion enhancement, smoothing and essential protection all in a single, perfect product.1 case + 1 foundation + 1 foundation refillWhen using for the first time, press firmly in the centre of the net several times with the puff to release foundation. With subsequent use, a single press will suffice. Dab the puff in the foundation, taking a small amount for each area of the face. Apply by dabbing on forehead, bridge of nose, cheeks and chin.

mp00056387.name: TOM FORD BEAUTY Lip Color Satin Matte

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: One-Stroke. Visibly-Plumped. Concentrated.Full-coverage in one single stroke. Vibrant and saturated with high-pigment color impact, the lightweight and longwearing formula features the rare and exotic nourishing ingredients of iconic Tom Ford Lip Color,including soja seed extract, Brazilian murumuru butter and chamomilla flower oil, along with collagen and a rich blend of marine-based ingredients that smooth and moisturize lips for the appearance of the ultimate voluptuous look.May be applied directly to the lips from the bullet or with lip brush.Apply using one stroke on top and bottom lips for maximum impact.For maximum impact, prime lips with Lip Exfoliator and Lip Lock Priming Balm before application. Use alone or together with Lip Sculptor.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: A long-wearing powder foundation that protects the skin with broad-spectrum UVA/UVB SPF 30/PA+++. Suitable for all skin types. Offers medium-to-full coverage and a smooth, natural matte finish. Colour stays true and wears long. Comes with a dual-sided applicator with a sponge side to apply the foundation and a flocked “puff” side to use the product as a finishing powder. Now in a sleek, reimagined side-by-side compact with chrome accents.Comes with a dual-sided applicator with a sponge side to apply the foundation and a flocked “puff” side to use the product as a finishing powder.

mp00055707.name: GIORGIO ARMANI My Armani To Go Essence-In-Foundation Cushion SPF 23  Refill

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: The 1st Armani Cushion with the best of coverage, comfort and silk glow. All the benefits of your liquid foundation on the go. The 1st Armani Cushion that takes care of your skin and that improves your skin texture day after day.The Armani secret to stay perfect on the go. More than a Cushion, an it accessory for face to be beautifully perfect anytime and anywhere.A next generation makeup essential that brings together a truly advanced formulation, a sleek, travel-friendly foundation with a professional applicator.Skin is instantly transformed with one simple gesture. A high-tech essence-in-foundation formulation - the essential accessory is complete. Supreme coverage, comfort & silk glow: with the precision of a couturier, formulators of MY ARMANI TO GO strike the perfect balance between tailor-made, buildable coverage and a light, “no make-up” sensation. Giorgio Armani Essence-In-Foundation Cushion comes in 6 shades from yellow beige to pink beige and sandy tones, matching very light to medium complexions. #MyArmaniCushion15gThis is a cushion refill only, cushion holder is required to be purchased separately.Gently soak the middle part of the applicator to pick up foundation.Then, swipe the face perfectionist applicator across the skin to spread the product and dab the face to blend.Repeat application, based on your coverage need.To finish, gently dab foundation under the eyes & around the nose and lips using the sharp shape of the applicator.Backstage tip: Before applying MY ARMANI TO GO, apply Glow-on Moisturizing Balm to prepare and hydrate the skin.You can apply it alone over your skincare routine, layer it over any Armani foundation, or use it to touch up your make up during the day.Do not use any other brushes to apply the product: the formula was especially developed to fit perfectly to the face perfectionist applicator.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Introducing an innovative foundation that delivers colour in an ultra-fluid, elastic gel- serum formula. With a virtually weightless feel, this formula is extraordinarily comfortable, lasting for hours. With stay-true colour and sheer medium buildable coverage, it softly blurs imperfections such as pores and fine lines, while also controlling oil. The addition of Moisture-Fusion Complex provides immediate and all-day hydration, leaving skin feeling quenched and silky to the touch. The unique dropper provides you with a drop of perfection.·Apply to skin using a sponge or desired brush.·Blend with fingers, sponge or brush.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: A name with the sharp zing of citrus zest and the minimalistic grace of an antique Japanese garden. This poetic alliance draws its inspiration from Japan’s ancient imperial city, Edo. In the land of the rising sun, the slightly spicy freshness of yuzu, a small fruit in the citrus family, is very popular. At the heart of the fragrance, it gains all of its icy elegance in a unique accord of juicy raspberry and thyme. Just as yuzu brings out the flavour of a delicate Japanese dish, Oyédo awakens the skin like a cold shiver.Raw materials: yuzu, green tangerine, thymeOlfactory accident: raspberry

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Prada’s latest fragrance evolved from the concept of an imaginary flower created especially for Candy. Of course, Candy cannot simply have any flower. Her fantasy flower must be unique, embodying her many facets: the fragrance’s light airiness puts the sparkle in her, followed by tender powdery notes that echo her Spring-like grace. A final whisper of warmth and honey reflects Candy’s rich sensuality.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
Givenchy presents the next chapter on the path to L’INTERDIT.

An impulsive breath that takes you to the edge of forbidden.

Duality incarnated. Darkness meeting light.

Colliding contrasts erupt in a burst of fearless femininity,

for a scent that’s dressed to thrill.



White imbued with light.

The shattering alliance of Orange Blossom &Tuberose

is disrupted by an exciting floral paradox.

A voluptuous white flower exposing a dark, hypnotic heart.

The shock appeal of iridescent white provoked by deep woody undertones

of Vetiver and Patchouli.



Radiant, exalted.

The underground flower emerges into light.

L’INTERDIT EAU DE TOILETTE, the thrill of the forbidden.

Exalt your true self.

classifications.value: Always playful, sometimes provocative, Miu Miu Twist expresses the true essence of Miu Miu. It opens with the sparkle of Vert de Bergamot and Apple Blossom, which gives way to a warm base of Cedar Wood and an exclusive new Pink Amber accord. Miu Miu Twist is a sensual andsurprising scent which captures the spirit of the Miu Miu girl. Miu Miu Twist Eau de Parfum is a beautiful gift for a girlfriend, sister or mother.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
A rich and creamy formula that leaves the lips with intense colour and a delicate satin finish. Enriched with organic Salicornia extract and mango oil, Joli Rouge intensely moisturises the lips for 6 hours and provides suppleness and comfort. 
The long-wearing colour stays on for 6 hours. For beautiful lips, simply. Dermatologically tested. Nourishes the lips. Leaves the lips comfortable.

mp00083734.name: GIORGIO ARMANI Smooth Silk Brow Pencil

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
Smooth silk brow pencil in a 12-hour wear, powdery, blendable formula

Intensify your eye makeup with a soft, smooth-textured, easy to apply brow pencil that gives a fuller & more defined shape to the brow line for a naturally structured, powerful eye look. Its high precision allows you to accurately fill and refine the brows. Its silky formula glides on effortlessly to subtly define or intensify your look. The highly pigmented formula lasts all day, up to 12 hours, and fits all skin types as not to slide off on oily skin. Smooth silk brow pencil is available in a subtle palette of 3 matte shades and comes with a fiber brush to easily comb and structure the hairs.
1. Draw along the bottom line of your eyebrows
2. Fill-in your brow line in short upward strokes

mp00083739.name: L'Oréal Paris Infallible 24H Fresh Wear Foundation

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
Result:
- Provides superior hold and moisturising comfort for 24 hour flawless coverage, no touch ups required.
- Fighting imperfections and shine without compromising on moisture, skin is left truly infallible.

Technology:
- New oxygen technology: Gives a a lightweight, breathable finish.
30ml
- Apply directly to a clean face using either a foundation brush or your fingers.
- To achieve best results, begin application in the middle of the face working outwards. Set with Infallible Compact Powder for a matte effect and even longer wearing results.

mp00083786.name: Helena Rubinstein Prodigy Cellglow The Luminous Skin Tint

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
"A concentrate of light in a revitalizing care.

The Luminous Tint Concentrate is the perfecting last step of Prodigy Cellglow routine.
A hybrid foundation fusing light & care with the Cellular Supreme of Edelweiss™, signature ingredient of Cellglow.
A 90% care infusion with high water phase and comfort oils. Its advanced water-rich formula associates 3 second-skin pigments to reveal the perfect youthful glow.
9 sublimating shades for perfected youthful glow.

Naturally even, your skin reveals a translucent fresh glow, as full of life.
"
30ml
"Pump a small amount of foundation on your fingertips. Blend into your skin from the middleoutwards. Patting gently onto areas that need extra coverage such as areas of redness. "
