mp00083884.name: CLE DE PEAU Refined Lip Luminizer

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
1.6g
A slim lipstick that imparts elegant color and luxurious luster to the lips, creating enriched luminous lips with sensual contours from various angles.
Melting at body temperature, it gently embraces the lips, delivering a moment of bliss.
For the first use, twist the bottom dial to the right until the lipstick extends. For each additional use, click the dial to your preferred length up to 3mm.
After use, twist the bottom dial to the left to retract the lipstick.
Extreme temperatures may cause the lipstick to fail to extend fully or retract properly. This will not affect the quality of the lipstick.
Store away from direct sunlight and high temperatures.
Avoid extending more than 3mm. Excess formulation cannot be retracted into holder.
Ingredients may separate, making the lipstick surface uneven. This does not affect product quality.

For the first use, twist the bottom dial to the right until the lipstick extends. For each additional use, click the dial to your preferred length up to 3mm.
After use, twist the bottom dial to the left to retract the lipstick.
Extreme temperatures may cause the lipstick to fail to extend fully or retract properly. This will not affect the quality of the lipstick.
Store away from direct sunlight and high temperatures.
Avoid extending more than 3mm. Excess formulation cannot be retracted into holder.
Ingredients may separate, making the lipstick surface uneven. This does not affect product quality.

mp00084745.name: YVES SAINT LAURENT All Hours Foundation

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Get ready for endless nights and days with: up to 24H long-wear, an innovative formula that is waterproof and transfer-resistant with no compromise on comfort, no need for touch ups even through non-stop activity. Full coverage: a rich level of fine pigments create a flawless, even coverage without a mask-like effect. Matte shine control: throughout the day, this oil-control formula keeps complexion shine-free and reduces the appearance of pores. Urban skin protection: enriched with a skincare complex and UV filters, this active foundation protects skin against external aggressions leaving it looking fresh and smooth. Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. Dermatologically tested - Non-comedogenic.DIRECTIONS FOR USE1 - Prime your skin before applying foundation for a long-wear mattified complexion with All Hours Primer. 2 - Apply the foundation with the YSL Foundation Brush, the YSL Teint Blender sponge, or your fingers. 3 - Spread the foundation evenly over your skin, from the centre of the face outwards using gentle tapping or swiping motions.

This musky fruity floral wraps you in the simple warmth of Tonka Bean, Musk and Clary Sage. Green Tea Fig. Delight your senses.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Offering an extension of BVLGARI MAN WOOD ESSENCE, the jeweller-perfumer imbues its new BVLGARI MAN WOOD NEROLI fragrance with the connection that unites man to the city and to nature, suffused with the vital energy of light.BVLGARI MAN WOOD NEROLI, an Eau de Parfum inspired by Nature and the Mediterranean – a land of light that is part of the BVLGARI heritage. A woody essence bathed in the brilliance of neroli that strengthens our connection to the Earth. A strong and powerful bond, drawing all its strength from the natural energy of the woods and the luminous vitality of citrus fruits. An intense contrast between the depth of wood that roots man in profound naturalness, which reconnects him to himself and with the powerful and energising light of the bitter orange tree.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Ease of drawing & excellent blurring! Keep the rich line of glossy all day long!A dense type with outstanding color that completes a dense line with a single coating. Newly formulated with moisturizing ingredients such as collagen and silk extract to provide eye care during makeup.Step 1 : First, draw it along the eyelash line from the eyes to the center with your eyes slightly lying down.Step 2 : Furthermore, draw along the eyelash line from the center to the corner of the eye.Step 3 : Finally, draw the eye corners with the eyes open and draw outwards 2-3 mm longer than the corners of the eyes.You can draw beautifully.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: This eyeliner is resistant to sweat and tears and lasts all day long. It can be easily rinsed off with warm water without a special cleansing. It does not leave the color on your skin.Draw a smooth line on the lash roots, from the inner corner of the eye and work towards the outer corner.For a subtle defining line, lightly drag the brush tip across the base of your lash line from the inner to the outer corner, pressing the brush as close to the lash roots as possible.Use less pressure to create a thinner line and add more pressure to create a bolder line or continue to layer until you achieve desired definition.For best results, wipe brush tip with a damp tissue before applying to prevent powder build-up, which may cause the eyeliner to dry out.Keep the cap closed after use.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
An essential eye shadow palette, designed to beautify. Melts into skin with a silky smooth touch, covering dullness and naturally highlighting the eyes. Layered colours help to create a sophisticated gaze. Available in four palettes, inspired by the four seasons of Japan.
1. Use the brush or a finger to apply base colour A across your entire eyelid from below your eyebrow, and your lower eyelid.
2. Use the brush to apply medium colour B across your upper eyelid. (i) If you prefer a stronger colour, please the use the thick tip.
3. Use the thin sponge tip to apply deep colour C on the corner of your eyes, as shown in the illustration.
4. Use a finger to apply illuminating colour D across your upper eyelid.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
An elegant liquid-type eyeliner with a fine brush for smooth, precise lines and vivid colour that's resistant to blurring. A single stroke can create your desired line evenly, both broad or fine.
・Pull off the cap and remove it prior to use.
・Use a new refill once the current one is empty.
・When using a refill, make the replacement without removing the cap.
・To remove the refill after using it up, hold the cap in your left hand and then turn the holder countercloclwise, as shown, for easy removal.
・Insert the refill into the holder as shown, and then rotate clockwise to set it.

If you find it difficult to have a steady hand, try supporting your hand with your little finger as you are applying the product. Apply along the lash line.

mp00086345.name: ESTÉE LAUDER Re-Nutriv | Ultra Radiance Serum Cushion SPF40/PA++++

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: With every touch, this luxurious cushion makeup releases the radiant power of Peridot for energized glowing skin. Plus the luminosity of millions more micro-fine gems for a flawless, jewel-like finish.Skin looks more even, imperfections and fine lines seem to disappear. Powerfully infused with Re-Nutriv’s advanced skincare technology, it leaves skin soft, supple and smooth. Creates a tone-up effect. With SPF 40, helps maintain skin’s elasticity and density and prevent the appearance of lines and wrinkles. Long lasting moisture keeps skin looking fresh and dewy.Medium buildable coverage. Long wearing and color true.Includes a custom-designed, power stone-inspired applicator. It’s perfectly shaped to provide even coverage over large areas, and precision application in small areas, such as around the nose.Press sponge applicator into cushion. Pat on to face and smooth out to blend. Repeat to build coverage. Close compact tightly after use. Works as a beautiful complement to Re-Nutriv Ultra Radiance Makeup.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
Discover the New L'Absolu Rouge Ruby Cream Long-Lasting Lipstick.

Ultra-pigmented long-lasting cream lipstick. Faceted like a real ruby, its creamy bullet gives you clear-cut lip makeup in just one stroke. Our exclusive lipstick formula combines longwear and comfort.

classifications.name: How to apply
classifications.value: L'Absolu Rouge Ruby Cream lipstick is designed to allow precise application and contouring of the lips. Start by contouring the lips with the top of the lipstick. Then, apply the lipstick directly to lips with the facet in the center.  The faceted edges allow a precise and easy lip color application even after several weeks of application.

mp00083842.name: Too Faced Diamond Light Multi-Use Diamond Fire Highlighter (CNY'20) #Diamond Fire

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
10g
Guerlain reinvents the subtle natural-looking tan with Terracotta Light, the new powder that wakes up the skin’s glow in three seconds.
This light powder features a unique blend of sun-kissed tones enhanced with vibrant colors to reveal the healthy-looking glow and radiance of every skin tone. The powder contains a cocktail of active ingredients to help the skin feel energize, protect it against free radicals and pollution* and preserve its natural hydration ensuring long-lasting comfort.
A radiant complexion, glowing and translucent, that gives a natural looking sun-kissed healthy-looking glow all year round.

Terracotta Light powder is available in 6 shades, one for every skin tone.

*in vitro test on ingredients
To give a luminous sun-kissed healthy glow look to the entire face, try the Guerlain secret : trace a "3" on the skin.

Apply the bronzing powder with a brush to the raised areas of the face by drawing a figure “3” on each side, from the forehead to the cheekbones, then from the cheekbones to the chin, finishing with a stroke down the neck.

classifications.value: Dolce Garden Eau de Parfum is a delicious flower blossoming in a garden where simple pleasures and spontaneity set the beat for a joyful dance during a lazy yet groovy afternoon.With Dolce Garden, the frangipani blossom joins the delightful bouquet of the Dolce family. A joyful, solar aura blending citrus and cream. An exquisite balance of freshness and sweetness, the scents of a blooming garden. To express the playful femininity of Dolce Garden, the unique designed bottle, the fragrance and flower cap take on a pastel pink portraying the innate delicatessen of flowers in bloom.Olfactory family: Floriental GourmandTop notes: Mandarin, Magnolia Accord, NeroliHeart notes: Frangipani Flower Accord, Coconut Essence, YlangBase notes: Vanilla Absolute, Almond Silk Accord, Sandalwood Accord

classifications.value: As you stroll down Rue des Rosiers in Paris, you can feel the vibrant, sparkling atmosphere along the cobblestone street, punctuated with the laughter from café terraces and snippets of shopkeepers' conversations. In the spring, the climbing rose bushes flower in clusters. The wind stirs their pompom blossoms and swirls their refreshing scent with the sweet, tangy smell of pastries.Apply perfume to pulse points (warmer temperature) - the inner wrists, the base of the throat, behind ear lobes, behind knees, and the inner elbows.

This inviting scent is a living landscape: where colourful poppies emblazon the rich gold harvest. Suitable to spray on pulse points. classifications.value: Elizabeth Arden 5th avenue NYC Lights is inspired by the pulsating excitement of the glistening town. As the sun sets on the avenue, the dazzling display of glitter stuns and the rush of the moment thrills. This sparkling floral opens with Chilled Cranberries and citrus oils that foray into a luminous heart of Creamy Orris and AmberXtreme. Pulsating endnotes of Patchouli Heart, Sandalwood Oil and Tonka Beans Absolute bring the fragrant experience to a dramatic close. For the woman who is invigorated by the NYC lights.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: As an iconic tribute to women, Ferragamo introduces Signorina Eleganza perfume: a rich and velvety olfactory fragrance that celebrates the most refined and gracefully seducing facet of femininity. The nude beige palette of the iconic Vara bow conveys a delicate and refined charm. A golden precious base raises and elevates the crystal bottle adding an extra touch of excellence. With its top note of grapefruit and pear, it leads to the middle note of almond powder and osmanthus absolute. It finishes with a base note of patchouli and white leather accord.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: A lively cocktail of fresh fruits notes flirts with a Mexican limeto free your positive energy.Quintessentially feminine, the Bondi Beach Flower blooms into a sun-kissed accord, embraced by salty amber facets that conjure the ocean’s turquoise waters.The graceful bottle of translucent blue glass recalls a precious droplet of the ocean. At the base, a hint of orange echoes the last rays of a sunset on Bondi Beach. Precious and timeless this new feminine bottle conjures all the sensuality and sophistication of the Cool Water Woman.

mp00049933.name: KENZO KENZO WORLD EAU DE TOILETTE

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
KENZO WORLD is a sparkling Eau de Toilette for a woman who dares to be herself. Like KENZO fashion, the fragrance blends genres, fusing its floral bouquet with fruity notes. The result is an amazing fruity floral combination of sparkling pear, luminous peony, almond blossom, and feminine iris—a feminine fragrance that does not take itself seriously.
The iconic bottle is dressed in an unmistakably fresh pink shade, a KENZO fashion wink. It was is inspired by the iconic Kenzo "Eye" seen in many of the brand's fashion collections.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: The iconic MOSCHINO teddy bear fragrance is back! As the unique 2nd edition, TOY 2 is this time sculpted in glass revealing an exclusive fragrance. TOY 2 comes in a fine transparent glass bottle with opaque finishes. The cap is the head of the bear, with a gold collar below for a touch of sophistication.Take 1-2 drops on your fingertips to apply or apply directly on pulsing areas. Back of ear, wrists, temple, inside of elbow, ankle, or back of knees are recommended. These body parts have relatively high temperature thus increase the scent.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Run Wild Davidoff, the new Eau de Parfum for women.Discover the freshness from the wild, inspired by wide-open spaces. Crafted with precious and noble notes, this juicy yet floral fragrance spreads the addictive scent of freedom. The juicyness of pomegranate & pistachio cream, blended with the precious jasmine absolute & sand flower release a delicate freshness. Run Wild, a callback to breathtaking nature, precious and floral sensuality.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Timeless modernity, creativity and a hint of audacity for a creation that celebrates the inextricable bond between Salvatore Ferragamo and trendy young ladies. A fragrance that captures the feminine and young Italian style in a cascade of floriental and fruity notes with an unexpected gourmand touch. The joyful yet romantic lilac colour reveals the iconic and chic shape of Signorina. The Vara bow shows a delicate combination of pink and lilac which infuses a sense of freshness.

mp00050136.name: Goutal Bois D'Hadrien Eau De Parfum

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: The waning daylight is an invitation to halt in the ochre hills of Tuscany. At this very moment, the evening reveals fragrances in all their glory. The warm notes of cypress waft from the undergrowth creating an impression of everlasting peace, as the scent of the lemon trees rolls down the hillside. A typical Italian landscape and the setting of Memoirs of Hadrian.Apply perfume to pulse points (warmer temperature) - the inner wrists, the base of the throat, behind ear lobes, behind knees, and the inner elbows.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
Dive into an explosive freshness. Givenchy twists the classic Cologne with an iris-infused electrifying citrus tonic. Bursting Bergamot, Lemon and Rosemary kick start an energetic climax, Musk and Vetiver soothe. An irreverent fragrance for free-spirits, who follow only their instincts.


A liberating shot of vitality for when it’s time to let go, flip the rules, feel the rush.

mp00050345.name: YVES SAINT LAURENT Mon Paris EDT

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Introducing the new Mon Paris Eau De Toilette. Love takes flight this spring with a fresher, lighter version of the iconic Eau de Parfum.The sparkling white floral fragrance of the original Mon Paris Eau de Parfum is transformed into an ultra-luminous floral citrus. A citrus start with grapefruit and raspberry juicy notes brings about a new fruity freshness. The floral and delicate heart of white flowers from the signature Eau de Parfum is romanced by orange blossom for a light side of love.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Challenging convention, La Femme Prada L’Eau is a fragrance that charts a new territory in freshness through an olfactory signature that re-imagines and exalts an inherent sensuality. A frangipani flower, fresh and green, is enriched by Mandarin essence and smoothed by Ylang Ylang notes. An airy mix that is enhanced by Tuberose. The essence of Mandarin is added to make the note fresher.

mp00050368.name: KENZO KENZO WORLD EAU DE PARFUM

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
This playful and dynamic floral scent combines peony, jasmine, and radiant Ambroxan® crystals to embody the Kenzo spirit: a celebration of freedom of expression, diversity, and creativity. 

As one of the most recognizable fashion icons of the Kenzo collection, the eye now transcends the fragrance universe. The striking bottle features black rubber, pink gold, and opaline recalling the mix and match of Kenzo fashion. When seen from the front or from above, the eye reveals itself in every angle.

mp00037068.name: theBalm Read My Lips® Lipgloss in HUBBA HUBBA!

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Unexpected color. Unapologetic collection. Let your lips lead the way. Introducing a new lineup of Lipstick inspired by the revolutionary vision of Francois Nars. Bring on bolds and brights for groundbreaking style; expose yourselfwith seductive nudes that leave nothing to hide. Dynamic blend of Moringa and Passion Fruit Seed Oils enhances color vibrancy and conditions lips for radically lightweight wear and unprecedented feel. Endlessartistry. Infinite expression3.5g

mp00054771.name: WHOO Radiant White Moisture Cushion Foundation

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Discover Matte Glow Foundation, the new generation of foundation that perfects the complexion with a luminous matte finish all day long. Its innovative second-skin formula blends seamlessly onto the skin for an even complexion, delivering an undetectable high coverage, for a flawless yet natural result. Enriched with a life-proof technology, Matte Glow Foundation is heat, humidity and pollution resistant.Available in 30 shades to cover all skin tones.30mlApply with the fingertips from the centre of the face and gently blend outwards. For a more precise application, use Burberry Foundation Brush No.04.

mp00053320.name: Urban Decay Stay Naked Weightless Liquid Foundation

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Find your naked truth with Stay Naked Weightless Liquid Foundation, our vegan, buildable medium coverage liquid foundation with a real-skin matte finish that lasts up to 24 hours. We designed this lineup of 18 shades with 9 shade intensities, 3 mastertones, and 4 undertones to dial in your precise color match. Our waterproof, longwear foundation feels like wearing nothing, thanks to a breathable, flexible formula that moves with you (all day and all night, up to 24 hours!). It not only feels better, it even looks better with its stay-true color, which minimizes the appearance of pores—so you always look like you.Urban Decay is 100% cruelty-free.Fill Weight: 30 ml / 1 ozGet customized coverage with Stay Naked Weightless Liquid Foundation by using different tools for application.• LIGHT COVERAGE: use the UD Pro Diffusing Blush Brush• MEDIUM COVERAGE: use a blending sponge or UD Pro Optical Blurring Brush• FULL COVERAGE: use a flat brush

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Infused with: coconut water to aid in delicately replenishing skin’s moisture levels alpine rose to help empower skin’s health and resiliencehyaluronic filling spheres for a smoother, more youthful appearance this oil-free foundation masterfully diffuses the line between makeup and skin. coverage so undetectable, they’ll think you were born this way.30mlTip: for “i woke up like this” perfection, apply from center of the face outward and blend. build to full coverage by layering as needed.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: A matte velvet finish, with a smooth feel and long wear.Discover the modern way to wear matte, inspired by the most opulent of English fabrics. The richly pigmented lip colour glides on effortlessly, delivering a creamy, soft-matte finish with elegant and bold full coverage in one stroke. The light-as-air, comfortable-wear lipstick delivers defined shape and continuous colour with a lasting velvet finish.- One-stroke full coverage- Creamy, soft-matte texture- Non-drying formula

mp00056075.name: TOM FORD BEAUTY Boys & Girls Lip Color (Soft Matte) 2g

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: CLUTCH-SIZED. DISCREET. EXCITING.To Tom Ford, there is no more dramatic accessory than a perfect lip. It is the focus of the face and it has the power to define a woman’s whole look. The collection showcases a decadent wardrobe of 50 rich, vivacious, sensuous shades that influence a mood and transform an entire look for maximum impact. Rare and exotic ingredients including soja seed extract, Brazilian murumuru butter and chamomilla flower oil create an ultra-creamy texture with an incredibly smooth application. specially treated color pigments are blended to deliver pure color with just the right balance of luminosity.2gMay be applied directly to the lips from the bullet or with lip brush.Boys: Layer a metallic Boy over any Boys & Girls formula.Girls: Layer Lip Color Sheer over or under any Boys & Girls formula.

Rare and exotic ingredients including soja seed extract, Brazilian murumuru butter and chamomilla flower oil create an ultra-creamy texture with an incredibly smooth application. specially treated color pigments are blended to deliver pure color with just the right balance of luminosity.2gMay be applied directly to the lips from the bullet or with lip brush.Boys: Layer a metallic Boy over any Boys & Girls formula.Girls: Layer Lip Color Sheer over or under any Boys & Girls formula.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Introducing new Kisses Lip Lacquer, Burberry’s first long-lasting liquid lip colour with a glossy, laminated finish. High-shine and full coverage in one stroke, the innovative, non-drying formula delivers bold colour with a comfortable gel-like texture. Hyaluronic acid enriched formula helps keep lips moisturised & supple all day.5.5mlUse the tip of the applicator to line your lips with precision, then use the flat part to fill in the lips for bold colour impact.

classifications.value: Shu Uemura’s rouge unlimited matte lipstick has an innovative formula that combines an ultra-smooth matte finish with a creamy texture that has a moisturizing feel. it’s comfortable matte you dare to wear every day.Choose from 28 shades to create unlimited looks for everyday moments in travel retail channel.3.3mlApply appropriate amount of liquid onto the center of the lips with an applicator, and spread it towards the edges of the lips for thin and even finish. contour the edges with the tip.

mp00057141.name: MAKE UP FOR EVER Artist Lip Blush

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: A jumbo lip crayon that gives the lips a matte velvety flush of color with just one coat!Inspired by blush’s ability to re-awaken every look, MAKE UP FOR EVER introduces a new addition to its ARTIST range for 2018: Artist Lip Blush , the softness of blush captured in a lipstick. Based on how pros use powdery textures to mattify lipstick textures, Artist Lip Blush gives the lips a velvety flush of color with a matte finish. This jumbo crayon is very comfortable, light and powdery. It takes just one coat to instantly make the lips blush. The precise jumbo tip of Artist Lip Blush eases its application for quick and easy touch ups in seconds. Carry this go-to lipstick everywhere, every day.2.5gGo Natural: Gently apply the Artist Lip Blush directly in the center of the lip, then blend it to the lip line using the fingertip to create a stained lip effect. Go Bold: Apply Aqua Lip Pencil onto lip contours and several coats of Artist Lip Blush on top to intensify its velvet effect. Go Creative: Apply the Artist Lip Blush color all over the lips and take a fluffy brush to smudge the lip line and get the look of trendy blurred and smudged lips.

mp00056247.name: Guerlain Parure Gold Radiance Cushion Foundation

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: NEW Guerlain Parure Gold Cushion Foundation - its exquisite, water-based texture melts into the skin to create a more radiant complexion application after application. Skin is instantly smooth, even, and radiant. A light and refreshing texture enables buildable coverage to achieve a one-of-a-kind result.15gApply in the morning - Gently press the mesh to dampen the puff, then apply to the entire face by smoothing the formula from the centre of the face outwards until the desired level of coverage is reached. Use for touch-ups throughout the day - Apply by lightly dabbing the centre of your face and blending outwards. Repeat as needed to create the desired level of coverage.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
COLOURS THAT SPEAK OUT.
Let your lips speak out who you really are with L’Absolu Rouge. Our cult lipstick reinvents itself, more precious and colourful than ever. From our timeless iconic colours to new vibrant shades, our range has it all: perfect nudes, intense reds, luminous pinks… an incredibly widespread palette of colours and finishes to explore and adopt. Which one will you choose?

MAKE-UP FINISHES TO UNCLICK
Click on the rose to open and unleash the color … and the finish. For the first time, our colour range features three different make-up finishes:
- SHEER: a buildable sheer colour with a subtle shiny finish
- CREAM: a creamy luminous satin finish
- MATTE: a comfortable creamy matte finish From effortless sheer to sophisticated cream to bold matte, there’s a lipstick to match your every mood. And, because colour is only beautiful on healthy-looking lips, all 3 textures are formulated with moisture-boosting Pro-Xylane™, for hydrated, soft and comforted lips.

COLOURS THAT SPEAK OUT.
Let your lips speak out who you really are with L’Absolu Rouge. Our cult lipstick reinvents itself, more precious and colourful than ever. From our timeless iconic colours to new vibrant shades, our range has it all: perfect nudes, intense reds, luminous pinks… an incredibly widespread palette of colours and finishes to explore and adopt. Which one will you choose?

MAKE-UP FINISHES TO UNCLICK
Click on the rose to open and unleash the color … and the finish. For the first time, our colour range features three different make-up finishes:
- SHEER: a buildable sheer colour with a subtle shiny finish
- CREAM: a creamy luminous satin finish
- MATTE: a comfortable creamy matte finish From effortless sheer to sophisticated cream to bold matte, there’s a lipstick to match your every mood. And, because colour is only beautiful on healthy-looking lips, all 3 textures are formulated with moisture-boosting Pro-Xylane™, for hydrated, soft and comforted lips.

classifications.name: How to apply
classifications.value: Start by lining the lips with Le Contour Pro lip pencil. Then, apply the lipstick with the brush of the pencil. For a more intense result, apply another coat of the lipstick directly on the lips.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Give skin a fresh, dewy glow with Water Blend's unrivaled formula that feels so lightweight, sheer and comfortable. The quick and easy application makes it ideal for face & body, as the water-based waterproof foundation evens out the complexion to leave a natural-looking, satin finish. Created with 80% water, this long-lasting unique water-gel texture naturally hydrates and blends in evenly for a smooth, flawless look.50ml

mp00056842.name: M·A·C Travel Exclusive: Versicolour Varnish X 2 #Brights

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Naturalness & make-up performance come together for the first time at Guerlain. A foundation made with 97% naturally-derived ingredients* with a natural glow finish that lasts for 16 hours**. The complexion is perfect, luminous and fresh. The comfortable texture becomes one with the skin, making it ideal for buildable coverage (light to medium). With L'Essentiel, bare skin is more beautiful, day after day. The formula lets the skin breathe; hydrates, balances and protects the skin from pollution. The complexion is more even; the appearance of imperfections is reduced. An unique and disruptive bottle by the designer Mathieu Lehanneur, inspired by the subtle art of balance. *Calculation based on the international ISO standard 16128 Parts 1 and 2. The remaining 3% contribute to optimising the formula's integrity over time and its sensorial texture. **Instrumental test conducted by an independent laboratory on 20 women.30ml1) Activate: To awaken the complexion, pat the skin with the L'Essentiel brush before applying make-up. Start at the inner corner of the eye, go to the ear, and then down towards the chin. 2) Prepare: Use Abeille Royale Youth Watery Oil as a primer. Apply two to three drops of the oil to the face and neck. The skin appears instantly smoother, plumper and revitalised. 3) Unify: Apply the foundation directly to the L’Essentiel brush, depending on the desired level of coverage: one drop for light coverage, two to three drops for medium coverage. Then dab the foundation onto the face at five points: forehead, nose, chin, left and right cheeks. Pat and blend the foundation from the centre of the face outwards until the result is even. 4) Enhance: Add a finishing touch to the face make-up with Météorites Compact for a shine-control effect followed by Terracotta Light for a sun-kissed healthy-looking glow.

mp00055783.name: La Prairie Skin Caviar Powder Foundation SPF15 UVA/PA++

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Skin Caviar Powder Foundation goes beyond mere makeup. It is the first powder foundation infused with Caviar Extract for complexion perfection.Gliding on flawlessly to envelop skin in a silky veil of complexion enhancing colour, Skin Caviar Powder Foundation begins as a creamy base and sets to a cashmere-soft finish. It offers buildable, blendable coverage for a matte yet luminous, fresh look all day long. Housed in a sleek cobalt blue compact complete with two mirrors – both a regular and a magnifying mirror – it is the ideal companion for unparalleled complexion perfection.BENEFITS:Refines skin's texture, smooths the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles and minimises the appearance of pores.|Preserves the level of hydration in the skin, leaving it with a feeling of comfort.|Provides a natural, matte, luminous finish for a youthful glow.9gWith the accompanying suede-like puff or with La Prairie’s Powder Foundation brush, apply with a press-and-roll motion, starting at the forehead, working over the bridge of the nose, over each cheek and finishing with the chin. Blend around hairline and down the nose, avoiding brows. Continue to blend around mouth, along jawline and down the neck for seamless coverage.

mp00055640.name: Dior Forever 24H* Wear High Perfection Skin-Caring Foundation

mp00055467.name: GIORGIO ARMANI Designer Lift Foundation SPF 20/PA+++

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Defy aging and reveal more youthful skin with a weightless full coverage foundation that softens the look of fine lines and wrinkles while polishing the complexion. Armani’s latest foundation features ten shades of a smoothing and firming fluid foundation with SPF 20. Claims: Restores up to 10 years of luminosity, firms lines up to 87%, and firms skin by 73%. The Invisible Face LiftThe Armani unique Micro-fil™ technology drapes the face with an ultrafine micro-lifting matrix. This elastic matrix seals in a high concentration of exclusive emollients and velvet filters that immediately lift, soften and firm for more youthful skin. Lifting ColorsThe new Armani glow: tailor-made with exclusive Prussian blue pearl pigment, giving intense depth and luminosity that revives skin and corrects color irregularities, while relieving dullness and adding a soft focus effect.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: POWER FABRIC is a new liquid foundation that teams full coverage with a matte, lightweight second skin finish. POWER FABRIC is a concentration of oils with no greasy effect, which delivers a velvet matte finish. To achieve perfect full coverage foundation, powerful pigments were selected and then shaped to obtain extremely fine pigment particles with a quality of color beyond reproach.POWER FABRIC combines full coverage with an ultra-light formula. Upon application, the texture melts into the skin, effectively blurring imperfections with an incredibly lightweight matte veil that feels like you're not wearing make-up at all. With a SPF 25 filter, power fabric offers effective daily UVA and UVB protection up to the promise of broad-spectrum SPF protection.Because every woman is unique, POWER FABRIC foundation comes in 8 shades to suit all skin tones. The formula is adapted for each shade to deliver optimal coverage without cracking or dulling.

mp00057731.name: Cle De Peau Radiant Liquid Rouge Matte

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: A liquid matte rouge that brings out bold, passionate lips, creating a luxurious color with soft contours in one swipe. classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Y IS YVES. Y IS THE QUESTION. Y IS YOU.Y, the new masculine fragrance by Yves Saint Laurent. Inspired by the iconic Yves Saint Laurent white t-shirt and black jacket, this Eau De Toilette represents a balance between freshness and strength. Like a crisp white t-shirt, notes of bergamot, sage and ginger offer a sharp juicy freshness to challenge convention and exceed all expectations. At its base, soft notes of balsam fir, cedarwood and marine ambergris embody the subtle power of a tailored black jacket that is refined, chic and surprisingly powerful. An authentic and bold creation; masculinity re-defined.Everything starts with a Why. #THATSY

classifications.value: The ideal man is a myth. But with L'Homme Idéal Cool, Guerlain has made his fragrance a reality. The ideal Eau de Toilette Cool ? A woody fragrance that will let you stay cool no matter what. The ideal bottle? Masculine, luxurious and elegant. A square, faceted bottle with clean lines and unique grey sides in a lacquered matte finish. A bright – yet dynamic- water green label. A heavy and decidedly masculine cap with guilloché detail borrowed from the world of watch-making.Spray onto the inner side of clothing or wrists.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: BAD BOY embodies the duality of man in a bold symbol of new masculinity. Strong but sensitive, heroic yet vulnerable, the BAD BOY is confident in who he is, embracing all sides of his contrasting personalities. BAD BOY Eau de Toilette captures the multiple facets of contemporary manhood in an explosive yet sophisticated modern scent.Surprising, elegant, powerful and sexy, spicy Black & White Pepper opens the scent, contrasted with the citric vibrancy of Italian Green Bergamot. The duality continues in the heart, where Cedarwood and Sage trade magnetism and elegance. The secret lies in the base of the scent; a sensual blend of Tonka Beans and Absolut of cocoa. Tonka Bean, Electric Mineral, White Pepper

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Fantasia invites you on a carousel ride, to escape the mundane routine and dive into an exciting adventure. Fantasia’s faceted glass bottle is feminine and elegant, yet playful. The bottle is topped with a precious Gold Unicorn that invites us into Anna’s magical world. For the first time Anna Sui introduces a floriental scent with Fantasia. Floriental is the love child of two harmoniously mingled fragrance families - the heady florals and the smooth exotic orientals. The result is a fragrance that is sensual and sweetly seductive, yet generally sparkling and lighter than true orientals.TOP NOTES: Pink Pomelo, Cassis, Pink Pepper MIDDLE NOTES: Violet, Orange Flower, Pastel Orchid, Raspberry Praline BASE NOTES: Golden Cypress, Himalayan Cedar Wood

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: A deeply fresh and elegantly masculine fragrance with a precious blend of breezy notes combined with Mediterranean aromatic and woody accords. A refined and bright freshness combined to a strong masculine character from the very top to the dry-down. The highly quality citruses vibrant notes of the fragrance fuses to the heart note of Geranium and Lavander. Patchouli and Vetiver sign this masculine juice crafted through the use of Mediterranean citrus, flowers and woods.

classifications.value: Run Wild Davidoff, the new Eau de Toilette for men.Discover the freshness from the wild, inspired by wide-open spaces. Crafted with raw and noble notes, this elegant yet sensual fragrance spreads the addictive scent of freedom. The freshness of lavender bush & fir balsam, falls into the warmth of tonka bean & cinnamon bark to reveal an oriental freshness. Run Wild, a callback to breathtaking nature, strength and masculine elegance.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Create Eyes like a work of art with our Couture Palette. The intense color is long-wearing and crease-proof. Our formula includes a high concentration of pearls and pigments and a network of transparent powders that result in a long-lasting complex for optimal hold. This smooth even blend finish is crease resistant for up to 12-hour hold.

classifications.name: Description

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: A true original. This award-winning long-wearing eyeliner offers the precision of liquid liner with the ease of a gel-based formula—all with 12 hours of waterproof and sweat- and humidity-resistant wear.Highly pigmented, this gel formula delivers subtle to dramatic looks that are easy to apply, long-wearing, and won't smudge or fade.3gDip the tip of the Ultra Fine Eyeliner Brush (sold separately) into Long-Wear Gel Eyeliner, being sure to coat both sides of the brush. Wipe off any excess on a tissue. Working quickly, apply liner in short, even strokes close to the lash line, from the inner to the outer eye corner.

mp00048026.name: MAKE UP FOR EVER Artist Color Shadow

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: A high color impact eye shadow with superior blendability and texture that stays put for up to 12-hour wear.Artist Color Shadow's atomized formula is loaded with pigment for high color impact in a single swipe. Its smooth, buttery texture allows for superior blendability, and stays put for unrivaled 12-hour wear*. Available in an array of finishes (matte, satin, iridescent, metallic and diamond), the ultrafine powders can be layered and mixed to create an infinite number of looks. Mix and match your favourite shades to create your customised refillable palette.2.5gPrep eyelids with STEP 1 Eye & Lip Primer as a base to enhance color impact and guarantee longer wear. Apply eye shadow with Brush #228 and blend with Brush #216.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: No need to be subtle when it's now so easy to move into the deepest, most dramatic range. Find all the intensity of a liquid liner in one simple stroke. Ophthalmologist Tested.• Swivel up only 1/8-inch (pencil does not retract to avoid exposing formula to air, which is drying). • Line eyes. • Use the tool on the opposite end to gently smudge colour to desired effect. • Allow colour to set for 60 seconds to ensure transfer-resis

Offers grooming alongside extreme colour precision in one dynamic microfine pencil that emulates fine hair-like strokes on brows for a perfected look. Confidently adds what you need: shape, colour and/or density. Like a pen, creates its own just-right point for striking arches. classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Youthmud® is a skin-transforming clay face mask that intensely exfoliates, revealing softer, smoother, more glowing skin in as little as 10 minutes. the mud mask that started it all, this facial treatment exfoliates with volcanic pumice rock to help smooth fine lines and soften skin’s texture, while natural clays lift impurities without removing skin’s essential oils. with antiaging ingredients and antioxidants from green tea leaves, youthmud® brightens and smooths for tighter, more glowing, youthful-looking skin. it’s the holy grail in hollywood for achieving instant camera-ready skin.

classifications.name: How to apply
classifications.value:
1. apply a thin, even layer to clean, dry skin.
2. leave on up to 10 minutes. product will tingle (that means it’s working!).
3. remove with water in circular motions to exfoliate.
4. use twice a week or as desired.
5. follow with a moisturizer.

classifications.value: Gently cleanses, purifies & regulates sebum quality, while removing impurities, pollution residue & make-up from face. Hypoallergenic, Paraben-free, Non-comedogenic, No colouring agents & Non-rinse.Sébium H2O is micellar water with high purifying power that gently yet powerfully cleanse and remove make-up, impurities and pollution residue from face. Enriched with ultra-purifying active ingredients, Sébium H2O limits sebum secretion and thoroughly cleanses the epidermis without drying out the skin.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Gently cleanses & removes impurities, pollution residue & make-up from face, eyes & lips. Fragrance-free formula, Alcohol-free, Paraben-free, Non-rinse & Hypoallergenic.Approved by dermatologists and adored by top makeup artists and celebrities, this well-researched innovation is formulated with highly purified water to suit even very sensitive skin. Sensibio H2O contains unique biomimetic molecules that are biologically compatible with your skin, offering gentle yet powerful cleansing and makeup removing efficacy. This innovative non-rinse formula has unique restorative properties that ensures skin feels soft and comfortable post-cleansing. Can be used as cleanser and/or makeup remover over face, eyes and lips .

mp00092501.name: SHISEIDO Synchro Skin Self-Refreshing Custom Finish Powder Foundation (Refill)

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: A creamy, powder foundation you can apply wet or dry for a customized, natural finish.  This foundation, with ActiveForce™ technology, synchronizes with skin and self-refreshes nonstop for a 24-hour just-applied look and flawless finish.  A SHISEIDO first in foundation, with ActiveForce™ technology, that self-refreshes nonstop so you maintain a just-applied, flawless finish that lasts 24 hours.  Our long-wear creamy, powder foundation synchronizes with skin and helps resist heat, humidity, oil and motion.  Apply wet or dry for customized coverage and a natural finish. Skin looks and feels fresh all day.  Weightless comfort. Breathable. Blendable. Buildable.  Coverage: Sheer-to-Medium, Buildable Finish: Customized, NaturalApply the powder foundation wet or dry for a smooth, refined finish that resists sweat, water, humidity, creasing and transference.   To apply wet: Dampen the sponge with water and squeeze out any excess.  Use the black side of the sponge to pick up a small amount of product and apply evenly by pressing onto the skin.  To apply dry: Use the white side of the sponge to pick up a small amount of product. Apply from the center of the face and sweep outwards, building additional coverage by tapping over areas where needed. For a natural polished finish, swirl the HANATSUBAKI HAKE Polishing Face Brush over the powder and buff onto the skin using circular motions  PRO TIP: To build coverage, spray the MARU FUDE Multi Face Brush lightly with water and gently swirl the damp brush over the powder. Apply to the center of the face and blend outwards.

mp00092444.name: YVES SAINT LAURENT Rouge Volupte Rock'N Shine

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Let's rock your lips with the new YSL lipstick: ROUGE VOLUPTÉ ROCK'N SHINE. The glitter star glides smoothly and melts onto lips with vibrant colours for a sparkling finish & resolutely rock look. Contains a new generation of glitters in YSL Beauty: renewable plant-sourced origin.  The scent of fresh mango is totally addictive and keeps bringing you back for more.  A silver casing with a touch of glitter on the cap that reminds the star on the lipstick.Apply straight to the lips for an easy on-the-go glide of fresh colour. A lip brush can also be used to spread the color over the lips or to add a second layer of lip color with precision.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: With the New Blush Subtil, you have infinite choices to effortlessly enhance your complexion and create a healthy, glowing skin look.   Ultra fine, this luxuriously silky powder blush fuses with the skin for a fresh and natural-looking complexion and long lasting comfort.  Silky, superfine micronized powder pigments in matte,shimmering and sparkling shades ensure irresistibly soft, blendable application. A palette of vivid colors to flatter all skin tones, easy to apply thanks to its precision brush.   Choose among a sparkling blush, a shimmer blush or a matte blush for versatile finish never looks dry or dull and skin feels comfortable all day long.  Ideal for all skin tones.How to create the Free Mix & Match ?   Step 1: Start Shining Apply a hint of L'Absolu Mademoiselle Shine on the lips.   Step 2: Don't Blush Apply a touch of Blush Subtil on the cheeks.    A. IN HARMONY: play with the same harmony to create a luminous and natural effect  Pick up the product with a cheek brush and apply it gently, starting from the center of the cheekbones and working upwards, then blend it for a natural result.    B. IN CONTRAST : play with the contrasted harmony to sculpt and define the cheeks.   Pick up the product with a cheek brush and apply it straight from the center of the cheekbones to the temples, to structure and define the face for a sophisticated result.    Mix, Match and enjoy !

mp00094504.name: ISSEY MIYAKE IGO L'Eau D'Issey Eau De Toilette 80ml

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
Discover Eau d'Issey, the timeless Issey Miyake fragrance, in a new and innovative format.
ISTAY bottle, IGO cap: IGO is a two-in-one scent with a travel format that encourages you to go on an adventure and discover its iconic fragrance. With IGO, Issey Miyake is proving itself to be an innovative force. 

L'Eau d'Issey is a simple and pioneering composition. A perfume whose scent evokes that of a drop of water on a female body.

There are two floral head notes: lotus and rose. 
The heart note develops a light sensuality, blending a bouquet of lily and fresh flowers. 
The precious wood base concludes the olfactory wake with panache.

classifications.value:

 Tender rose and punchy pink peppercorn illuminate the musk heart,  wrapped in sensual amber and patchouli base notes.

mp00094515.name: DOLCE & GABBANA The Only One Eau De Parfum Intense

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Femininity finds new intensity in with The Only One Eau de Parfum Intense, the latest edition in the The Only One fragrance line from DOLCE&GABBANA Beauty. The Only One Eau de Parfum Intense builds on the floriental legacy of The Only One with a captivating new scent. Like the woman it represents, the fragrance is an intricate combination of intense and solar sensuality. Alluringly feminine and irresistibly seductive, its signature lies in the surprising combination of sparkling Italian mandarin, dazzling gold orange blossom contrasted with hypnotizing black vanilla.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: What it is: A full-coverage, long-wearing cushion compact foundation with the same, innovative capsule technology as our best-selling original Cushion Compact.14gHow to use it:Press enclosed puff into cushion to release foundation. Apply foundation to clean, moisturized skin starting around the nose and mouth, then blend out to the rest of the face. For an ultra-polished look, apply with the Full Coverage Face Brush (sold separately). After use, be sure to close compact tightly to preserve freshness.

Apply foundation to clean, moisturized skin starting around the nose and mouth, then blend out to the rest of the face. For an ultra-polished look, apply with the Full Coverage Face Brush (sold separately). After use, be sure to close compact tightly to preserve freshness.

mp00085723.name: Shiseido Makeup Synchro Skin Self-Refreshing Foundation

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: GOES ON EFFORTLESSLY. REFRESHES NONSTOP. WEIGHTLESS. BREATHABLE.A SHISEIDO first in foundation that self-refreshes non-stop. Powered by ActiveForceTM technology, this foundation synchronizes with skin and helps to resist heat, oil, humidity and motion so you maintain a just-applied, flawless finish that lasts 24 hours. Developed with Synchro Skin Responsive Sensory Technology to adapt to the needs of your unique skin and respond to changes in your environment. Flawless, smoother-looking skin instantly. Weightless comfort. In a range of stay-true shades.Medium, Buildable Coverage Fresh, Natural FinishFor All Skin TypesOil-free30ml• Shake well before use. • Twist pump to unlock. Hold the bottle at an angle and press downward on the top to dispense product. • Apply after skincare, smoothing on evenly from the center of the face outward. Build your desired coverage level with additional layers.• To re-lock, twist the pump back into place. • Wipe dispenser after use.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: The idea of the fragrance is "be-yourself". Transparent, silky and very sexy. A fresh woody fragrance unisex with a fresh opening of bergamot, mandarin, juniper, lavender, peppermint and green notes. In the heart of the composition is jasmine, orchid, freesia, magnolia with a fresh hint of peach. There are cedar, amber, musk, sandal and vanilla in the base.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
A special oval-shaped lead with moderate stiffness allows for smooth and precise control, with a delicate and natural finish. Resistant to color shading.
・Hold the end of the pen and turn the shaft to the right so that 2mm of the lead comes out.
・The product includes an eyebrow brush attached to the opposite end. Use it to blend colour and structure the brow line.
・If the lead doesn't come out and you hear a clicking sound when you turn the shaft to the right, this means you may need to replace it with a refill.
・To remove the refill after using it up, remove the cap, hold the end of the pencil and pull and it can be removed.
・When using a refill, please insert in the direction of the arrow as shown.

mp00050458.name: Giorgio Armani Sì Fiori Eau De Parfum

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: A sumptuous chypre neroli of contrasting character, Sì Fiori suggests in the unexpected union of blackcurrant nectar and mandarin creating a fresh and balanced composition.Then, neroli essence spread radiance throughout a signature bouquet of rose and patchouli.Musk and delicate touches of Vanilla Pure Jungle Essence™ intensify the irresistible appeal of the composition.The pink-tinged bottle, an ode to simplicity, seems to be caressed by the morning sun. The inner-lacquer with nuances of nude, remains understated beside the bottle’s feminine curves, graced by a golden ring.The choice of SÌ Fiori is the choice to be a spontaneous, elegant woman, who is radiant and vivacious.Apply on pulse point: wrist, inner elbow and neck.

mp00050460.name: ESTEE LAUDER Modern Muse | Eau de Parfum Spray

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Be an inspiration. Experience the fragrance that captures your style, your confidence, your creative spirit. An alluring contrast of sparkling florals and sleek, sensual woods. Two distinctively different accords—Sparkling Jasmine Accord and Sleek Woods Accord—provide an intriguing dual impression. It's a true innovation in fragrance design, as complex and fascinating as the woman who inspires it. Spray 1-2 times on pulse areas, or inside clothes.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Be an inspiration. Experience the fragrance that captures your style, your confidence, your creative spirit. An alluring contrast of sparkling florals and sleek, sensual woods. Two distinctively different accords—Sparkling Jasmine Accord and Sleek Woods Accord—provide an intriguing dual impression. It's a true innovation in fragrance design, as complex and fascinating as the woman who inspires it. Spray 1-2 times on pulse areas, or inside clothes.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Behind its delicate and evanescent appearance, Miracle Secret is a fragrance full of contrast and character, marked by a Jasmine-Nashi Pear duo.Immediately, the initial departure catches the attention with Bergamot Green Essence, a unique, fresh and sculpted quality that infuses a radiant and zesty light throughout the entire length of the note. Pink Berries then steps in with its spicy, explosive and almost electric facet, while delicious and juicy Nashi Pear notes add freshness and crispness.The floral heart unveils the dazzling power of a fresh and solar Jasmine Sambac Absolute swirled into a floral flight composed of an accord of verdant, herbal Peony and fruity, airy Rose Absolute.At the base, an amber-woody accord shakes up this eminently feminine, floral complex. Virginia Cedar essence gives it structure and a vibrant, ultra-modern charisma. The smooth, sugary nuances of a Vanilla accord warm up the fragrance with their tender sensuality. Sensuous, fruity musks envelop it in delicate, mellow sweetness.Spray Miracle Secret directly on the skin, on the inside of the wrists, under the ear lobe, behind the knees.

mp00050505.name: GIORGIO ARMANI Acqua Di Gioia Set

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: The latest chapter in Prada Candy’s story reveals a new facet of her character. An addictive cocktail of femininity, at once wildly liberated and elegantly refined, now Prada Candy Night explores the world after dark. Within Prada Candy Night, bitter Orange and vivid Iris inject vibrant colour into a heart of Patchouli, Musk and Tonka bean. A seductive overture of rich Cocoa absolute ensures irresistible depth.

mp00050518.name: Juicy Couture Viva La Juicy Noir 100ml

mp00050549.name: MIU MIU Fleur D'Argent EDP Absolue

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: The new Miu Miu Fleur d’Argent Eau de Parfum Absolue is all about preciousness and elegance: the Miu Miu family grows by exploring a more feminine and sensual facet of the Miu Miu girl.Last-born of Miuccia Prada and perfumer Daniela Andrier, Miu Miu Fleur D’Argent is the first fragrance of the brand to introduce a new top note. The sensual, sophisticated Tuberose is a thicker, more mature white flower. A balanced composition with an overdose of Musk accord and Akigalawood® trails provide an enveloping roundness. Miu Miu Fleur D’Argent is like the layering of an elegant jacket over a sexy dress: the scent starts with a refined arrival, followed by a dazzlingly sensual expansion. Faithful to the Miu Miu matelassé glass, Fleur d'Argent bottle is now magnified by an internal silver lacquering and a vintage pastel pink disk which make the bottle becoming a must-have. Playing with the light reflections and the mirror facet of the silver bottle, Fleur d’Argent is now a jewel.Top Notes: Tuberose AbsoluteHeart Notes: Akigalawood® Accord Base Notes: Musk OverdoseSpray on pulse points around the body to increase the longevity of the fragrance.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: No glitter. Just glow. Highlighting hits a new high with NARS’ new Highlighting Powder. This uncompromising innovation delivers next-level luminosity with Seamless Glow Technology—a blend of sheer powders and pearls to create second-skin luster that blends effortlessly. Its satin-soft, micro-spherical powder layers evenly and weightlessly, fusing onto all skin tones.8gUltra-refined and soft-to-the-touch, new Highlighting Powder accentuates skin with buildable radiance and a seductive, dewy finish. Features go from delicately lit to strobed in the speed of light.

mp00055774.name: La Prairie Skin Caviar Loose Powder

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Skin Caviar Loose Powder is the perfect conclusion to an indulgent beauty ritual – the first loose powder infused with Caviar Extract for complexion perfection.Skin Caviar Loose Powder sweeps on lightly, embracing skin with the most feather-light whisper of powder for a flawless finish. It illuminates the complexion and sets makeup for an all-day youthful, natural, shine-free finish. Housed in an elegant cobalt blue jar with a convenient hinged lid, Skin Caviar Loose Powder also comes with a complementary portable jar for touch-ups during the day.BENEFITS:Refines skin's texture, smooths the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles and minimises the appearance of pores.|Preserves the level of hydration in the skin, leaving it with a feeling of comfort.|Sets foundation for long wear.|Provides a natural, matte, luminous finish for a youthful glow.50gOpen the lid and unlock the sieve by sliding the button. Close the lid again before gently shaking the jar to release the powder. Open again and with the accompanying generous puff or with La Prairie’s Loose Powder brush, apply to face in a swirling motion for a flawless look, starting at the forehead, working over the bridge of the nose, over each cheek and finishing with the chin, avoiding brows and blending at the hairline.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Your skin – almost bare, but better. This advanced, oil-free formula provides a translucent veil of color and sun protection while helping to reduce the appearance of hyper-pigmentation and dark spots in just four weeks. Infused with lush, naturally derived botanicals and ingredients to immediately help thirsty skin feel hydrated. Kopara from French Polynesia and mineral rich seawater revive and re-mineralize skin for a softer, smoother, and brighter natural glow. Skin is transported. Hydrates and helps reduce the appearance of hyper-pigmentation and dark spots for a brighter natural glow.Advanced, oil-free formula provides a translucent veil of colour and sun protection while helping to reduce the appearance of dark spots.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: A CC Primer in three colors Rose (brightens dull and tired skin), Apricot (blends uneven skin tone) and Lavender (neutralizes yellow).The first CC primer by YSL instantly color corrects and boosts your skintone’s unique glow. Flawless skin diffuses pure light.The pigmented lightweight primer targets color and skin imperfections. The primer color-corrects irregularities, diffuses light and improves skin texture: pores are minimized, imperfections reduced. Skin appears exceptionally radiant and flawless. Use under foundation or alone. To maximize radiance, use with YSL Touche Éclat Foundation.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Introducing Double Down Brow, the buildable, high-tech putty-to-powder formula, for smudge-proof brows that last up to 16 hours (even through your gym sesh!). Add depth and dimension to your arches—the intensity level is up to you. Shape brows with the putty, then seal in long-lasting, customized color with the powder. The mini double-ended brush is your new BFF–an angled brush on one end and a mini spoolie for blending on the other. Urban Decay is 100% cruelty-free.Urban Decay is beauty with an edge™.2 x 1.8gMix both shades together to quickly tint lighter brows or to fill in spots with missing hair (works on scars, too!). Keep it soft by buffing product out after each application with provided spoolie.This formula lets you layer it up without that clumpy finish.Mix and match different combos of Double Down Brow to create custom shades and finishes.For a natural ombré effect, use the lighter shade towards the inside mid- section of brow. Switch to the deeper shade right at the arch and blend towards the tail.Want your brows to last all day?! Spray brush with All Nighter before dipping into putty for an even longer, more vibrant effect.

mp00055182.name: M·A·C Lightful C + Coral Grass Tinted Cream SPF 30/PA+++ With Radiance Booster

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: This colour-correcting cream reduces imperfections and controls oil while increasing the natural radiance of your skin instantly and over time. Infused with a Lightful Radiance Booster, Coral Grass and vitamin C, this unique complex works to correct your overall complexion by reducing the appearance of pores and diminishing dark spots and hyper-pigmentation, while SPF 30/PA+++ forms a protective barrier against UVA/UVB rays. Now redesigned with chrome accents.Smooth evenly all over the face or to the desired areas after moisturizer (right before foundation) with fingertips, sponge or brush.

classifications.value: The magic light of Touche Éclat in the 1st radiance awakening foundation by YSL Beauty. More fatigue-defying and better flawless coverage than ever.Enriched with the stimulating power of Ruscus Extract, the anti-fatigue formula energizes skin by stimulating micro-circulation and targeting dullness to instantly improve skin brightness and luminosity. Vitamin E protects against free radicals. Formulated with SPF 22 to provide sun protection, it leaves a weightless finish while offering eight hours of a refreshed, radiant look.30mlPump 2 drops in the well of your Y-brush. Developed with an exclusive Y-shape reservoir, the Y-brush delivers the perfect amount of Touche Éclat Foundation. The brush buffs and distributes product evenly across the skin for a seamless, flawless finish every time.

Available in 24 shades for ultimate self-expression.12g•Press gently on the saturated sponge with the enclosed applicator, a brush or fingers. •Smooth onto face and blend evenly. •When foundation can no longer be extracted by pressing on the saturated sponge, replace with a refill.

mp00055039.name: YVES SAINT LAURENT Le Teint Touche Éclat Uv Compact Refill B20

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: For Asian women, who naturally aspire to flawless, luminous beauty, the spring and summer months represent a special challenge, bringing with them – in addition to intense UV radiation – extreme levels of heat and humidity. Yves Saint Laurent Beauté therefore took up the challenge of recreating the magic light, pure colour and sensorial texture of LE TEINT TOUCHE ÉCLAT in a new UV protective, long-lasting foundation for a made-to-measure coverage specifically adapted to resist the rigours of the Asian spring and summer seasons. The result is the new LE TEINT TOUCHE ÉCLAT UV.

mp00055618.name: MAKE UP FOR EVER Ultra HD Skin Booster #Universal

mp00056084.name: GIVENCHY Teint Couture Everwear 24h Wear & Comfort SPF 20 PA++

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
Nicolas Degennes, Makeup & Color Artistic Director of Parfums Givenchy, has created Teint Couture Everwear, the 24-hr* wear foundation that stands up to your every emotion.

This silky, high-coverage foundation perfectly evens out the complexion, smooths the skin's texture, lastingly conceals imperfections and revives the skin's natural glow.

The complexion appears impeccable, even up-close, and is lastingly uniform.



Its 24-hr* wear, SPF 20 PA ++ protection, moisturizing properties and waterproof** formula make this foundation your loyal ally in the face of any emotion.

Formulated to resist intense days, physical activities and varying weather conditions, it is your essential beauty partner each day.



The non-oily, multi-sensory texture blends with the skin, leaving a layer that is imperceptible to the touch for a nude skin sensation.

It is available in 30 shades – each of which is based on one of two undertones, yellow or pink – to best suit a wide variety of skin tones.



* Instrumental test on 20 people

** Does not refer to the sun protection factor

mp00056012.name: Dior Travel Eyes and Lips Mini Palette #Be Intense

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Météorites Compact is a travel version of the legendary pearls that corrects, mattifies and delicately brightens the complexion. The pearls are finely pressed to reborn in a harmony of 4 beauty-enhancing shades to offer the perfect amount of light adapted to each skin tone. The pressed powder features the signature Météorites corrective matte and light-catching shades, offering tailored radiance to each complexion. Its Stardust Technology - a light-reflecting polymer - transforms light that is invisible to the naked eye into an extraordinary halo. Thanks to its blurring formula, pores and imperfections are smoothed while the skin feels incredibly soft and silky. A shine-control action leaves the skin looking smooth, luminous and matte while at the same time helping it to retain moisture. Météorites pressed powder is your best ally for a flawless complexion; enhancing the beauty of the skin and creating radiant finish that lasts all day.8gMétéorites pressed powder improves the hold of your make-up and enhances the beauty of your complexion. Use as a final touch to your make-up routine or to touch up your look during the day. The 4 shades can be applied together to even out and bring radiance to your look or individually to correct uneven skin tone. For boosted radiance, highlight the curved areas of the face: using the special Météorites brush, draw a G from the middle of the forehead to the top of the cheekbones and from the bridge of the nose to the tip of the chin.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: A whole new way to set and perfect.The NEW Sheer Pressed Powder is the ideal compact companion to create a healthy matte finish—wherever you go.Soft and velvety to the touch, this lightweight pressed powder seamlessly blends away imperfections with weightless coverage.Formulated with Miracle Broth™ and raw ocean clay, skin stays comfortable and shine-free throughout the day.Light-reflecting pigments create a soft blurring effect for a multi-dimensional look that’s matte—never flat.To Use: Dust over The Soft Fluid Long Wear Foundation SPF 20 to set; touch up throughout the day as desired.Use with your full La Mer regimen.

mp00056326.name: SHU UEMURA The Lightbulb UV Compact Refill

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: The lightbulb UV compact foundation is a unique powder foundation that provides SPF 30 protection. In the convenience of a compact, enjoy medium to high coverage and a matte finish for a perfect look. The special formula glides on smoothly for comfortable application and a flawless finish.This product is a compact refill. Case is sold separately.12g Use the lightbulb UV sponge to apply. The sponge contains 2 sides, first use the sponge side to apply and then use the fabric side to polish. The compact is also suitable for wet usage for higher coverage and glow. Simply apply water on the sponge side.

classifications.value: The lightbulb UV compact foundation is a unique powder foundation that provides SPF 30 protection. In the convenience of a compact, enjoy medium to high coverage and a matte finish for a perfect look. The special formula glides on smoothly for comfortable application and a flawless finish.This product is a compact refill. Case is sold separately.12g Use the lightbulb UV sponge to apply. The sponge contains 2 sides, first use the sponge side to apply and then use the fabric side to polish. The compact is also suitable for wet usage for higher coverage and glow. Simply apply water on the sponge side.

classifications.name: Description

Enriched with antioxidants and suited for all skin types, they can be used individually or combined to match any skin tone. Helps to correct skin tone and conceal dark circles, blemishes, moles, tattoos and birthmarks.•Apply to skin directly with finger or concealer brush. •Blend with finger or concealer brush.

mp00056488.name: M·A·C Lightful C Naturally Flawless SPF35/PA++ Foundation

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: This multi-tasking luminous foundation works as a moisturizer, skin treatment, sunscreen and foundation for a youthful-looking glow. Exclusively developed in Asia, the hydrating lightweight formula offers medium buildable coverage that helps even skin tone and imperfections, while diffusing light to neutralize the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles and pores. All these benefits come with the highest SPF-protection (SPF 35/PA++) M∙A∙C offers in a liquid foundation.•Shake well and apply one pump of product into palm. •Warm the foundation between hands, then apply a small amount onto skin with fingers, starting in the centre of the face and working outward in sections.•Alternatively, apply to face or area where coverage is desired using a sponge or brush and blend.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: More than a lipstick. Encased in an elegant silver and leather tube, Le Rouge is a rich with luxe pigments that coat the lips with radiant, lasting color with a single stroke. The lightweight, ultra-smooth, non-sticky texture glides on to softly shape and contour the lips, beautifully.3.4gBegin by defining the contours of the lips with a lip liner. Using your fingertip, gently blur the liner toward the inside of the lips, then fill with Le Rouge from the center, working outwards.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Addictive soothing sensation and pure and even lipstick in a single stroke. Buildable coverage and a luminous satin finish.Available in a palette of 20 radiant shades, from the most natural nudes to the most vibrant shades, adapted to all skin tones.3.4gLe Phyto Rouge is a care lipstick with an ultra-silky texture that envelops the lips with a fine, smoothing, contouring and hydrating film. Thanks to the "Hydrobooster Complex" composed of microspheres of Hyaluronic Acid and Konjac Glucomannans, lips are  immediately plumped up, voluptuous and smoothed. With repeated applications, Le Phyto Rouge preserves the youthfulness of lips : a cocktail of enhancing oils provides nutrition, suppleness and elasticity. Day after day, lips are more suple, softer, more elastic. Its new-generation gel texture blends into the lips upon contact like a fluid and provides a sensation of incomparable, lasting comfort. A combination of ultra-pure pigments provides an immediate color impact and an ultra-luminous finish. Its zebra-striped, magnetic case, both elegant and modern, contains a faceted bullet for fine and precise application. Apply the lipstick directly onto the lips or with a lip brush (the Phyto-Lèvres Perfect lip brush for example). May be applied with a fingertip for a lighter stained effect.

Gives you an amazing 8-hours of bold color impact.The indulgently creamy-rich formula is instantly hydrating. Lips look plump, shapely, sensuously smooth.In irresistible Creme (creamy satin) finishe, provide full-coverage color in one swipe. mp00057623.name: BOBBI BROWN Skin Weightless Powder Foundation SPF16 PA+++

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: This light-as-air powder foundation delivers a soft, cashmere-like texture with a healthy skin finish and lasting wear—in a convenient compact.Who is it for:Anyone with normal to oily skin types who want a powder foundation with adjustable, natural-looking coverage.Why is it different:Inspired by the look and feel of gorgeous skin, this oil-free powder has a soft, creamy texture that feels moist and comfortable. It blends evenly and seamlessly onto skin, blurring imperfections and pores for a buffed, polished finish that stays fresh and resists sweat and humidity.11gFor medium to full coverage: Apply with a puff or dry sponge (included in compact). For sheer coverage: Dust on with a powder brush.This is a refill only, holder is required to be purchased separately.

mp00058279.name: GIVENCHY Rouge Perfecto Caring Lip Balm

mp00056730.name: GIVENCHY Matissime Velvet Radiant Mat Powder Foundation Absolute Matte Finish SPF 20 PA+++

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
An extremely soft and velvety powder that neutralizes shine to reveal a lastingly matte complexion. True color and a lightweight sensation for a natural result and absolute comfort.


Ultra-matte technology

the airy structure of silica microspheres ensure an absolute matte finish:

- their ability to capture water and sebum gives them up to three times more absorbency than classic powders.

- Composed of multiple micro-canals, they offer a unique sensation of lightness, allowing the skin to breathe.

Simultaneously, a natural ingredient absorbs excess sebum and moisture to help the skin maintain its balance for controlled shine. ColorIntact correcting pigments, protected by a silica coating, work to preserve the radiance of the complexion and extend color hold.



Refines, protects and evens-out skin tone:

Matissime Velvet is enriched with Black Cumin oil which is renowned for its purifying benefits. The skin is protected and its pure beauty revealed.



A radiant matte result for a velvet complexion

Freed from excess oil and humidity, the skin benefits from a long lasting, naturally matte finish. Hour after hour, color stays true, without darkening. The complexion is even-toned, shine-free and luminous. Imperfections are concealed. The skin’s texture is smoothed and the appearance of pores is reduced. The skin breathes freely. Its natural radiance is preserved.

Freed from excess oil and humidity, the skin benefits from a long lasting, naturally matte finish. Hour after hour, color stays true, without darkening. The complexion is even-toned, shine-free and luminous. Imperfections are concealed. The skin’s texture is smoothed and the appearance of pores is reduced. The skin breathes freely. Its natural radiance is preserved.

mp00056621.name: GIORGIO ARMANI Power Fabric Foundation Fluid SPF25

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: POWER FABRIC is a new liquid foundation that teams full coverage with a matte, lightweight second skin finish. POWER FABRIC is a concentration of oils with no greasy effect, which delivers a velvet matte finish. To achieve perfect full coverage foundation, powerful pigments were selected and then shaped to obtain extremely fine pigment particles with a quality of color beyond reproach.POWER FABRIC combines full coverage with an ultra-light formula. Upon application, the texture melts into the skin, effectively blurring imperfections with an incredibly lightweight matte veil that feels like you're not wearing make-up at all. With a SPF 25 filter, power fabric offers effective daily UVA and UVB protection up to the promise of broad-spectrum SPF protection.Because every woman is unique, POWER FABRIC foundation comes in 20 shades to suit all skin tones. The formula is adapted for each shade to deliver optimal coverage without cracking or dulling.

mp00089981.name: TOM FORD BEAUTY White Suede Eau de Parfum

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Lancôme introduces the new Hypnôse Eyeshadow Palette: 5 flattering shades in an exclusive user-friendly design, to easily create natural to dramatic eye makeup looks. A collection of 10 different eyeshadow palettes to offer an infinite choice of effects.   Its reinvented formula offers an extremely soft and creamy texture for an effortless application. The weightless and velvety eyeshadow powders are easily blendable, for a rich and homogeneous color payoff that lasts up to 12 hours. Wet, the Hypnôse eyeshadows reveal a more intense effect.   97.1% said the eyeshadow has a soft texture* 95.2% said the eyeshadow leaves a homogeneous, even finish * 95.2% said the eyeshadow leaves the eyelids comfortable all day long *  *Consumer test on 102 women• Prepare the eyeshadow base using the shade 1 from your Hypnôse Eyeshadow Palette all over the eyelid and on the brow bone.  • To define your upper lid, apply the shade 2.  • Bring intensity and highlight your look with the eyeshadow shade 4 in the outer corner then blend it.  • Apply the shade 5 as a liner on your lash line with a thin eyeshadow brush to structure your eye.  • Finally, add volume and brightness by applying the shade 3 on the center of your upper lid.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
Succumb to the pleasure of this sensory cocktail and its innovative shine. Rouge Volupté Shine combines melt-in texture and vibrant colours for a delicious finish.
19 classic YSL colours for sensual lips. Calling all pleasure addicts, let your lipstick instinct take the helm. Rouge Volupté Shine is a new way to wear and play with colour. Incredibly lightweight offering subtle coverage, containing colour infused within a melt-in high-shine balm texture.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Discover Dolce Shine by Dolce&Gabbana, a sunny fruity floral fragrance composed by a delicate solar bouquet that reminds of the moment between winter and spring in the gardens of the Amalfi Coast in Italy. Be charmed by the colorful top notes of luscious mango scent, contrasting with a natural grapefruit essence. Discover the bright jasmine perfume notes mixed with a supple accord of sundrenched blond woods. All these fruity aromas live in an elegant bottle with an adorned bottle cap. This solar, cheerful and irresistibly fresh fragrance is an ode of the Italian joy of life

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
For him bleu noir eau de toilette extrême is an urban and modern reinterpretation of freshness: the signature musk heart is juxtaposed with fresh citrus notes and woody, sensual base notes. 

Sharp, fresh & vibrant, this new fragrance revists masculine duality: the musk heart is wrapped in Vert de Mandarine and basil to create freshness. Woody Cedar and Ebony notes combine to perfect this long-lasting fragrance.
