classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
Ginger is a sophisticated fresh fragrance on a contrasting warm woody base.

It opens with a vividly fresh mix of bergamot and ginger before settling into semi-spicy mix of pepper, vetiver and cedarwood. Rich and full, but quite subtle.

Top notes: Ginger, Bergamot, Lime
Middle notes: Basil, Pepper, Violet
Base notes: Vetiver, Cedarwood

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
Lavender opens with a mix of citrus notes before it evolves to reveal its true nature with a blend of the three greatest floral notes: lavender, rose and iris.

Finishing touch is based on a solid cedar-sandalwood accord with soft and warm notes of amber and musk.

Top notes: Bergamot, Lemon, Grapefruit
Middle notes: Lavender, Iris, Rose
Base Notes: Sandalwood, Cedarwood, Amber, Musk

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
Pepper&Tobacco is an award winning blast of spices allowing a surprising freshness just at the opening.

Fresh notes of bergamot and grapefruit bursts before settling down into a mixture of two clashing spicy accords: blazing spices of pepper and saffron with the breadth of tobacco.

Top notes: Bergamot, Grapefruit, Pepper
Middle notes: Saffron, Cinnamon
Base Notes: Tobacco, Vetiver, Leather

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: A high performance, tinted, sun protection cream created especially for the face.Provides defense against UV rays and photoaging while delivering instant and lasting hydration.Moisturizing and retexturizing ingredients, as well as a high coverage corrective finish, help to perfect the look of skin and inspire a natural glow.Keep skin smooth, protected, and moisturized.30mlTake up an appropriate amount of cream onto fingertip and smooth over skin evenly. When applying to face and neck, use as the final step of morning skincare. Apply before base makeup.Remove with makeup remover and follow with foam.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Tattoo YSL’s Tatouage Couture on your lips for a luscious ultra-matte look. As the formula glides onto your lips you will feel practically nothing as it is quick-drying and transfer-free. Indulge your lips in perfect nudes, polished pinks, and to-die-for plums. The spatula-like applicator gives the precision of a liner with the control of a brush for perfectly defined lips with every application.More matte, more intense, taken to the absolute extreme – a breakthrough formula delivers over the top color pay-off with an undetectable, naked feel. With high pigment concentration, deposited in a really thin veil. From morning to night and back round to morning again, Tatouage Couture leaves the ultimate lasting mark.6mlFOR DEFINED MATTE LIPSDefine lip contours with the sharp edge of the lip marker. Apply one coat on the center of the lips with the widest side of the lip marker.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Volupté Plump-in-Colour enhances your lips thanks to a volume-effect and a comfy care lipstick. Fresh colours and a melty shine for irresistible lips.3.5mlApply straight to the lips for an easy on-the-go glide of fresh colour. A lip brush can also be used to spread the color over the lips or to add a second layer of lip color with precision.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Potency and precision—the new power couple. An innovative concentrate of our most powerful matte yet. Fluid Pigment Complex, liquefied pigment with a zero-gravity feel, introduces infinite matte color saturation with ultra-flexible long-wear. Sensorial, lightweight texture that applies like an ink on lips. Dries down to lock in formula for a smudge-resistant, carefree wear. Matte. Empowered.Precautions: Shake well before use. Product may stain. Open slowly. Please make sure the cap is securely closed when product is not in use.

mp00055415.name: TOM FORD BEAUTY Boys & Girls Lip Color 2g

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: CLUTCH-SIZED. DISCREET. EXCITING.To Tom Ford, there is no more dramatic accessory than a perfect lip. It is the focus of the face and it has the power to define a woman’s whole look. The collection showcases a decadent wardrobe of 50 rich, vivacious, sensuous shades that influence a mood and transform an entire look for maximum impact. Rare and exotic ingredients including soja seed extract, Brazilian murumuru butter and chamomilla flower oil create an ultra-creamy texture with an incredibly smooth application. specially treated color pigments are blended to deliver pure color with just the right balance of luminosity.2gMay be applied directly to the lips from the bullet or with lip brush.Boys: Layer a metallic Boy over any Boys & Girls formula.Girls: Layer Lip Color Sheer over or under any Boys & Girls formula.

mp00055375.name: TOM FORD BEAUTY Lip Lacquer Luxe Vinyl

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Super-shine. Volume. Longwear. Tom Ford elevates liquid lipstick in a decadent, high-shine vinyl formula. Intense, saturated color coats lips with supple, longwearing comfort. Pigment- maximizing technology envelops concentrated pigments in ultra-cushion-like emollients, creating smooth, second-skin film on lips. 10 liquid vinyl shades, from the glossy nude of Softcore to the magnetizing coral of Unzip, lacquer lips in candy-like gleamUse applicator tip to apply color onto lips for desired look. Allow to dry.

classifications.value: Lipstick is the ultimate gesture of beauty. In just one stroke, luxurious, rich color dresses the lips with intense hydration and antioxidant care. In a signature couture jewel-like packaging, Rouge Pur Couture delivers the promise of edgy style and ultimate feminine strength.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Shu Uemura’s rouge unlimited satin lipstick is now available in a new, lightweight formula that melts evenly and smoothly, for comfortable layering of pure, intense colors that last for hours without feathering. From wines and burgundies to pinks, the range of 25 colors offers unlimited possibilities of expression.3.3mlApply appropriate amount of liquid onto the center of the lips with an applicator, and spread it towards the edges of the lips for thin and even finish. contour the edges with the tip.

mp00055212.name: TOM FORD BEAUTY Boys & Girls Lip Color Sheer 2g

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: CLUTCH-SIZED. DISCREET. EXCITING.To Tom Ford, there is no more dramatic accessory than a perfect lip. It is the focus of the face and it has the power to define a woman’s whole look. The collection showcases a decadent wardrobe of 50 rich, vivacious, sensuous shades that influence a mood and transform an entire look for maximum impact. Rare and exotic ingredients including soja seed extract, Brazilian murumuru butter and chamomilla flower oil create an ultra-creamy texture with an incredibly smooth application. specially treated color pigments are blended to deliver pure color with just the right balance of luminosity.2gMay be applied directly to the lips from the bullet or with lip brush.Boys: Layer a metallic Boy over any Boys & Girls formula.Girls: Layer Lip Color Sheer over or under any Boys & Girls formula.

mp00055197.name: M·A·C Versicolour Varnish Cream Lip Stain

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Captivate with a lip colour hybrid that’s glossier, higher coverage and harder impact than ever before. Its watery-light formula glides on creamy and comfortable to impart long-wearing, saturated full coverage and an always-fresh wet finish. Find entrancement in its 12-hour, intense staining power – promising to last far into the day and night.•Apply directly to lips with doe foot applicator.•As with many lip stains, lips might feel slightly dry over time. If desired, prep lips with a lightweight lip balm or our Prep + Prime Lip.•Product not recommended for use on overly dry or sensitive lips.•For optimal lip definition, use with Lip Pencil or Pro Longwear Lip Pencil.

mp00055194.name: Too Faced Lip Injection Extreme Power Plumping Lip Gloss

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Introducing NARS’ first 16-hour foundation that stays turned on by the power of radiance.Untraceable. Unstoppable. Unlike anything else.Longwear is finally lightweight—and radiant.High coverage is now super natural. It wears longer, stays stronger, and looks better with each hour. Your future looks radiant with Natural Radiant Longwear Foundation.16-HOUR FADE-RESISTANT WEAR16 hours of fade-resistant wear with medium-to-full, buildable coverage.Transfer-resistant. Sweat-resistant. Resists oxidization so color stays true all day.Stays fresh and vibrant, as if just applied.FULL-POWERED RADIANCEInstantly provides a lasting radiant finish.Skin Optimizing Complex, a blend of Raspberry, Apple, and Watermelon extracts, helps support skin elastic fibers to smooth and improve skin’s texture over time for optimal radiance.FULL COVERAGE WITHOUT THE WEIGHTPatent pending technology delivers a uniquely weightless and breathable texture.Superior blendability for an imperceptible effect that looks natural, like skin, doesn’t look or feel cakey, heavy, drying or masking.PERFECTLY MATCHES SKINTONEA unique combination of translucent base with micronized amino-acid coated pigments and mineral tone balancing powders that mimic skin’s tone, fusing with skin for the closest match.33 skin-matching shades to fit all skin tones and undertones.Dispense one pump or a pearl sized amount of Natural Radiant Longwear Foundation and warm with fingertips.Too much formula accentuates lines and imperfections. Avoid excess application around eyes or contours of the face.Apply foundation starting at the center of the face and blend out with fingertips. Focus on one area at a time and blend well.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Lightweight and hydrating, delivering a burst of translucent, buildable colour with a sheer-shine finish.Introducing Burberry Kisses Sheer. The subtle, luminous formula, inspired by the runway, locks in moisture and provides a burst of translucent, buildable colour.The lightweight gel texture melts onto the lips with precision, delivering a shiny tint in just one swipe. Infused with our signature blend of rosehip, tea and lavender, it conditions lips with a sheer-shine finish.Available in 28 shades that will flatter all complexions from gentle tones to vibrant full colour.- Buildable sheer shine- Lightweight gel texture- Moisturising

mp00056273.name: NARS Aqua Glow Cushion Foundation SPF23/PA++ Refill

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Introducing the Aqua Glow Cushion Foundation SPF 23/PA++, skin’s on-the-go shield against dehydration, pollution, and sun damage. Formulated with NARS’ Triple-Force Anti-Pollution Complex and SPF 23, the water-enriched foundation helps to protect skin against urban pollution, smog, PM 2.5 (fine air pollutants), and the aging effects of UV rays. Its natural cooling sensation leaves skin glowing with weightless moisture and a radiant finish. Offering medium-buildable coverage, the cushion foundation is available in six Asian-specific shades.Includes an Aqua Glow Cushion Foundation Sponge.Compact case & refill sold separately.

mp00056168.name: Make Up For Ever Reboot Active Care-In-Foundation

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: A smart foundation that corrects the 5 effects of tired skin for visible results, instantly and over time.REBOOT Active Care-in-foundation instantly revitalizes dull-looking skin to achieve a glowing, rested complexion. Exclusive Active Care Matrix Complex gradually delivers nourishing ingredients to brighten, smooth, firm, hydrate and even out tired skin. It’s ultra-sensorial and silky-smooth texture provides exceptional comfort for normal to dry skin, giving it a satin finish and natural, radiant flow.30mlApply with Buffing Foundation Brush #112, from the center of the face outwards. Build coverage in specific areas using dabbing motions.

mp00056151.name: Revlon Photoready Candid Natural Finish Anti-Pollution Foundation

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Get comfortable! This incredibly creamy, moisturizing and protective foundation has the ingredients you do want, without the ones you don't.22ml1. Use the pump to dispense the amount of our foundation you want onto our Dual Sided Applicator, our Buffing Foundation Brush, or your fingers. (Better to start with less and add more if you need it—the coverage is buildable!)2.Blend onto skin, working from the center of your face outward.3. For the best results, finish with PhotoReady Candid™ Anti-Pollution Setting Powder.

mp00058043.name: Shiseido Makeup Synchro Skin Self-Refreshing Dual-Tip Concealer

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: A BREAKTHROUGH IN CONCEALER.GOES ON EFFORTLESSLY. REFRESHES NON-STOP. WEIGHTLESS. BREATHABLE.Brighten under-eye fatigue and dullness for an instantly fresher look. Immediately diminish the appearance of dark circles, spots, redness and blemishes. Powered by ActiveForceTM technology, this formula synchronizes with skin and helps to resist heat, oil, humidity and motion so you maintain a just-applied, high-quality finish that lasts 24 hours. Developed with Synchro Skin Responsive Sensory Technology to adapt to the needs of your unique skin and respond to changes in your environment. Looks flawless. Weightless comfort. Blendable. Buildable. Our innovative applicator is specially designed for easy, zero-drag application. Use the precision tip for targeted areas and fit-to-face, curved silhouette for controlled swipes.Medium to full coverageNatural, lasting finishFor all skin types6ml• Apply a small amount of concealer directly onto the skin to conceal discoloration under the eyes, around the nose, and any imperfections you want to cover.• Using your ring finger, gently tap the concealer onto your skin and blend to create a natural finish.• Use with the TSUTSU FUDE Concealer Brush on areas that require a more precise application.PRO TIP:Choose a shade 1 to 2 tones lighter or darker than your regular tone to highlight and shape your face.

mp00057309.name: BOBBI BROWN Instant Full Cover Concealer

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Concentrated, highly-pigmented coverage that visibly brightens stubborn dark circles and softens hollows and tired lines in an instant—no sleep required.6mlPump cleansing oil into dry hands and smooth over dry face. Splash warm water onto skin and massage to help dissolve surface impurities and makeup. Rinse skin clean with warm water. Apply Hydrating Eye Cream to the under eye area using a gently patting motion; massage Hydrating Face Cream on to clean skin.

mp00056903.name: BOBBI BROWN Intensive Skin Serum Concealer

mp00056539.name: ESTÉE LAUDER Double Wear | Radiant Concealer

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Loves your skin. Matches your skintone.Conceal and contour with this creamy, comforting concealer that is super-blendable, long wearing for 12 hours and crease-resistant.Nourishes with botanical extracts, including Chia, and Camelina and Kukui Nut Oils.The radiant formula brightens the eye area, as it conceals dark circles. Hides spots and tones down redness.Oversized two-sided sponge tip applicator has a flat-angled edge for concealing, contouring and highlighting larger areas of the face and a precision tip for perfectly covering dark circles.Comes in 4 shades. Medium-to-full coverage. Radiant finish.Conceal, contour and highlight large areas using the flat angled edge of applicator. For hiding dark circles, use the precision tip. Choose a concealer shade that matches your skintone and foundation or is one shade lighter.Find your perfect shade: Choose your skin’s intensity level (from ultra light to very deep) and undertone (cool, neutral or warm).

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: An emollient-based lightweight and creamy concealer that provides discreetly opaque coverage. Contains SPF 35 protection. Offers smooth, long-wearing, invisible correction for all skin blemishes, imperfections and discolourations with a natural matte finish. This formula is so concentrated that a small amount can conceal and correct a number of imperfections. The antioxidant-rich concealer helps to absorb excess oil and feeds the skin with derivatives of vitamin A and E.●Apply to skin directly with finger or concealer brush.●Blend with finger or concealer brush.

mp00055685.name: M·A·C Lightful C Spot Concealer SPF30/PA++

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: A dark spot-targeting concealer specially formulated with the expertise of research and development labs in Japan. This concealer not only conceals dark spots perfectly, but can also be used to target areas of concern using advanced skincare technology (Quasi-Drug Whitening/Anti-Inflammatory in Japan) to prevent UV-induced spots and freckles. The formula is tenacious and stays put for hours, while protecting skin from UV rays and further UV damage with SPF 30/PA++. It provides full coverage and a natural matte finish.•Apply directly to dark spots or hyperpigmentation using the applicator’s specially designed silicone soft tip to precisely and easily target areas.•Tap gently with fingertip to settle product into skin (do not blend or rub into skin, as it may ruin the precision of the finish).•For best results, use before applying powder products and after applying liquid/cream products.

mp00055648.name: M·A·C Studio Fix 24-Hour Smooth Wear Concealer

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: This lightweight fluid concealer provides seamless coverage, blurs imperfections and offers all day comfortable wear. The formula wears up to 24 hours while providing mediumtofull buildable coverage. Skin looks smoother, even and selfieready. Its small spongetip applicator makes it easy to zero in on any area, making it your musthave magic wand. Skin looks fresh and perfected with a natural matte finish that’s never dry or cakey.Apply directly to skin using the wand applicator and blend.

The formula wears up to 24 hours while providing mediumtofull buildable coverage. Skin looks smoother, even and selfieready. Its small spongetip applicator makes it easy to zero in on any area, making it your musthave magic wand. Skin looks fresh and perfected with a natural matte finish that’s never dry or cakey.Apply directly to skin using the wand applicator and blend.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: An ultra-pigmented, full-coverage concealer, Teint Idole Ultra Wear Camouflage Concealer hides imperfections with a comfortable feel and it doesn’t crease. Which skin type is Lancôme Teint Idole Ultra Wear Camouflage Concealer good for? ✔ Normal ✔ Combination ✔ Oily ✔ DryConceal imperfections all day with this high-pigment, full-coverage concealer. Teint Idole Ultra Wear Camouflage High Coverage Concealer is easily blendable and buildable to reveal a more even skin tone with a natural matte finish.12ml• Squeeze a pea-sized amount of liquid concealer on the back of your hand, and use your fingers to warm up the product before application.

mp00053634.name: Urban Decay Stay Naked Correcting Concealer

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Meet Stay Naked Correcting Concealer, our vegan, real-skin matte concealer with 25% more pigment and full coverage that lasts up to 24 hours. With an expanded range of 12 shades, there's enough coverage to go around. Our Stay Naked Concealer lineup features 8 shade intensities, 3 mastertones, and 5 undertones. Use this flexible, real-skin matte finish concealer for just about anything, from covering imperfections to highlighting cheekbones. The patented wave tip applicator makes it easy to get the right level of coverage—use the flat side for precise, light application or lean into the curve for smooth glide-on application and heavier dose of product.Urban Decay is 100% cruelty-free.Fill Weight: 10.2 g POIDS NET / NET WT. 0.35 ozJust use the flat side for precise, light application or lean into the curve for a heavier dose of product when you need extra coverage. Correct, cover, conceal...repeat!

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Looks flawless. Lasts 15-hours. Feels comfortable, never dry. Stays seamless, without creasing.The lightweight creme formula creates the perfected look of flawless skin and lasts all day. Transfer-resistant, color-true, with medium buildable coverage that won't slip, slide or melt away. Luminous finish.Infused with minerals and emollients to condition skin and make blending easy. Oil-free. Water, perspiration and humidity-resistant.Apply after your skincare regimen.Press sponge applicator into cushion, pat onto face and smooth out to blend. Repeat to build coverage.Close compact tightly after each use.To Clean SpongeWash gently with mild soap and warm water.Lay on a flat surface to air dry.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: You asked, we listened—our cult-favorite Highlighting Powder is back. This high-impact, light-reflective powder gives skin shimmering pink highlights and is ideal for strobing. Plus, it\'s housed in a sleek, mirrored compact, so you can take your glow to go.Using the Face Blender or Sheer Power Brush, lightly dust Highlighting Powder on the cheekbones, décolleté–anywhere you want to add a glow.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Convenient pencil creates perfectly defined, natural-looking brows. Ultra-fine tip fills even the smallest gaps with precise, hair-like strokes. Automatically self-sharpens; glides on without skipping or tugging. Colour lasts all day.• To dispense product, hold tip with one hand and rotate stem counterclockwise one full turn per use.• Use light, feathery strokes to mimic natural hair, filling in where needed.• Remove with your favourite Clinique eye makeup remover.• Pencil only swivels up and not down. For best results, twist up liner 7-9 clicks per use.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
Tuberose is a sweet bouquet of exotic white flowers, lightly infused with pear and dominated by tuberose, ylang ylang and jasmine.

At the base, amber wood highlights and warms the flowers while patchouli gives an earthy depth.

Top notes: Pear, Pepper, Bergamot
Middle notes: Tuberose, Ylang ylang, Jasmine
Base notes: Patchouli, Amber, Musk

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
Tuberose is a sweet bouquet of exotic white flowers, lightly infused with pear and dominated by tuberose, ylang ylang and jasmine.

At the base, amber wood highlights and warms the flowers while patchouli gives an earthy depth.

Top notes: Pear, Pepper, Bergamot
Middle notes: Tuberose, Ylang ylang, Jasmine
Base notes: Patchouli, Amber, Musk

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
Oud is an oriental fragrance with a very strong woody character.

An interesting mixture of raspberry, saffron and resinous frankincense blends smoothly into strong woody notes of incense and oud wood.

The combination stimulates the senses with its complexity, while the intense oud base provides its character and depth.

Top notes: Raspberry, Saffron
Middle notes: Incense, Frankincense
Base Notes: Oud, Patchouli, Amber

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:

Base Notes: Oud, Patchouli, Amber

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
Rose Oud is a unique and powerful fragrance with oriental woody notes.

The concise blend opens with an enchanting aroma of elegant roses intermingled with a hearty dose of exquisite oud wood and finally softens into a rich, vanilla-scented amber accord.

Top notes: Violet
Middle notes: Oudwood, Rose
Base Notes: Vanilla, Amber

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: This sophisticated cologne features top notes of bergamot, lavender, and warm cinnamon, artfully balanced with heart notes of mimosa flower and rich leather. Lower tones combine tobacco leaves and oak moss for a deep, elegant, and stylish cologne which celebrates the city of London and its distinctive style.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
Bergamot&Musk is a fresh scent that releases bursts of bergamot and apples in the opening and then leads to the sharp heart of birch and patchouli with a hint of jasmine and rose.
The musky base is even sharper, with oakmoss and amber being laid on a light vanilla base.

Top notes: Bergamot, Blackcurrant, Apple
Middle notes: Birch, Patchouli, Rose, Jasmine
Base Notes: Vanilla, Amber, White Musk, Oakmoss

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
Bergamot&Musk is a fresh scent that releases bursts of bergamot and apples in the opening and then leads to the sharp heart of birch and patchouli with a hint of jasmine and rose.
The musky base is even sharper, with oakmoss and amber being laid on a light vanilla base.

Top notes: Bergamot, Blackcurrant, Apple
Middle notes: Birch, Patchouli, Rose, Jasmine
Base Notes: Vanilla, Amber, White Musk, Oakmoss

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
Agarwood, one of the most precious ingredients in a perfumer's lab, gives to this blend it’s woody character and name.

Along with cardamom and rosewood in their purest forms and a hint of balancing vanilla at the base; this smoky blend stands out with its beautiful complexity.

Top notes: Rosewood, Cardamom, Pepper
Middle notes: Agarwood, Sandalwood, Vetiver
Base notes: Vanilla, Amber, Tonka Bean

classifications.value:
This floral-fresh scent has gentle top notes of rose and honeysuckle, deep heart notes of tiare flower, jasmine and peony and a hint of fresh clementine zest.
Solar notes of sandalwood, musk and patchouli add a subtle warmth to create an inspiring fragrance.

HIS REINVENTION OF A CLASSIC EAU DE COLOGNE FEATURES CRISP CITRUS OILS, SURPRISING FLORAL NOTES AND AMBER UNDERTONES TO LEAVE A SPLASHY YET SUBSTANTIVE IMPRESSION.TUNISAN NEROLI, ITALIAN BERGAMOT, SICILIAN LEMON, WINTER YELLOW MANDARIN, ORANGE FLOWER, LAVENDER, ROSEMARY, AMBER.ON CLEAN SKIN, SPRAY ONCE OR TWICE ON DESIRED AREAS. DO NOT RUB THE FRAGRANCE ON SKIN. THIS MAY ALTER HOW THE FRAGRANCE DEVELOPS.

classifications.value: London at its most fashionably young and fun. Flirt with oh-so floral neroli and a delicious wink of basil. Quintessentially British, always playful. Fresh, fun, full of adventure. Suitable to spray on pulse points. classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: A pure fragrance as sunlight, and extraordinary bright hue that radiates with a fiery intensity. Pure sensuality, transparency, light : a fresh and vivid floral perfume.Take 1~2 drops on your fingertips to apply or apply directly on pulsing areas. Back of ear, wrists, temple, inside of elbow, ankle, or back of knees are recommended. These body parts have relatively high temperature thus increase the scent. Olfactive FamilyFloral, fruity, woodyPear sorbet, Nymphea, Mimosa

Risk it all. Never stop. Desire your destiny. Now. Criticism, ignore it. Diamonds, lets have more. Brilliant magnolia flower on heady woods and cognac-addiction. Deliciously insolent. Intoxicating like success...

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Jimmy Choo Fever, an addictive fragrance celebrating a new facet of the Jimmy Choo woman, an innate extrovert with a playful energy and sense of fun. Effortlessly glamourous and instinctively seductive, no one’s going to get in her way. A hypnotic play on contrasts between floral and gourmand, Jimmy Choo Fever is an addictive new scent that carries its wearer into the night, leaving an addictive sensual trail behind her.Top Notes: Black Plum NectarHeart Notes: HeliotropeBase Notes: Roasted Tonka Bean

A hypnotic play on contrasts between floral and gourmand, Jimmy Choo Fever is an addictive new scent that carries its wearer into the night, leaving an addictive sensual trail behind her.Top Notes: Black Plum NectarHeart Notes: HeliotropeBase Notes: Roasted Tonka Bean

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Si, meaning yes in Italian, is Mr Armani’s tribute to modern femininity. This new iconic fragrance is a modern chypre – made up of the sweet blackcurrant, tender rose, elegant patchouli and subtle musky wood. The bottle makes a beautiful gift. The black cap is made of the expensive Bakelite, inspired by modern art and the rose gold colour of the liquid symbolizes positivity. The 2 golden rings around the neck and bottom of the bottle symbolizing love. Wear this Armani fragrance and have the courage to say Si to Love, Si to Life and Si to strength.

mp00051029.name: KENZO AQUA KENZO POUR HOMME EAU DE TOILETTE

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
It is their totem, their prime element, their antidote to normality. Water Addicts form a community, and they have finally found their fragrance: AQUA KENZO.

For Her, an addictive immersion in an ultra-fresh formula: juicy, catchy Mandarin, crisp and colorful Raspberry Leaf, enveloped in the dazzling sensuality of Magnolia. A fresh, unusual and radiant floral scent.

For Him, a dive into a contrasted water: Pink Berries and Walnut Leaves sign a captivating scent with singular vegetal accents, while a new generation Sandalwood quivers with sensuality in this fresh and assertive woody fragrance.

The shimmering hues of this very contemporary perfume infuse the very texture of the bottles: sea green for her, cobalt blue for him. Two blocks of ultra-modern, innovative colors protected by the totem of the Hokusai Wave.
The down-to-earth will go on their way, Water Addicts will see in it an irresistible invitation to enjoy new extraordinary water sensations.

classifications.value: Idylle... It is ardour and intensity.Created in 2009 by Thierry Wasser, Guerlain House Perfumer, Idylle is a love dream by Guerlain.In this combination of the chypre sensuality and the intimate facet of white musks with a bouquet of flowers, the symbol of a declaration of love, Thierry Wasser expresses the sensuous and romantic idea of the idyll.

mp00051466.name: GIVENCHY Live Irrésistible Blossom Crush EDT

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
Live Irrésistible, Givenchy’s most joyful fragrance, boldly sings the praises of joy in its purest form. Its latest variation, Blossom Crush, is a sparkling and irresistibly charming Eau de Toilette that advocates spontaneity as an asset and freedom as power.
Just like its unpredictable heroine, Live Irrésistible Blossom Crush is an astonishing floral bouquet. It reveals an abundance of fresh, delicate petals of roses and peony with a twist of cocoa bean, the unexpected ingredient which tinges the fragrance with a bittersweet note for an immediate crush.



Adorned with the Givenchy House’s trademark studs enhanced with a luminous mauve hue, the slender facetted bottle is a fresh and modern remedy against the blues.



With Live Irrésistible Blossom Crush, delicateness turns into impertinence, and the crush becomes love at first sight.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
Gucci begins its new beauty story from the lips. A lipstick is the ultimate makeup tool, its fascination and desirability a result of its instant transformative power. Gucci’s three new lipstick collections are diverse formulations: Rouge à Lèvres Satin with a satin finish, Rouge à Lèvres Voile with a sheer finish, and Baume à Lèvres, a lip balm with a translucent finish.
Baume à Lèvres enhances the natural smoothness and texture of the lips. The lip balms give a soft glow of colour with three shades and one transparent formula, melting on lips to leave a feeling of hydration, moisture and comfort.
Inspired by vintage makeup the lipsticks’ packaging interweaves House motifs with contemporary codes. Baume à Lèvres is contained in a turquoise coloured tube, a hybrid shade of blue and green chosen specifically by Alessandro Michele because it represents an attention to colour, before pink was assigned as symbolic of the feminine world post war.

classifications.value:
Clarins has put a new matte finish on its legendary lipstick in a luxuriously hydrating formula that strikes a seamless balance between non-drying lip make-up and a flawless velvet look. 
It's velvety texture is light and creamy, gliding gently onto the skin for extremely easy application : the intense matte colour instantly illuminates the lips and cares for them too.

Benefits:
• Striking colours in matte finish
• Hydrates lips 
• Light and comfortable texture

mp00063113.name: Urban Decay Stay Naked The Fix Powder Foundation

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
Everything you love about Stay Naked Foundation—now in a powder. The Fix’s super-blendable shades feature medium buildable coverage and a real-skin matte finish that doesn’t transfer. The silky, breathable formula is water and sweat-resistant, and contains moringa seed oil for anti-pollution and anti-aging benefits. Includes a charcoal-infused sponge to detoxify and mattify skin with every application.

Urban Decay is 100% cruelty-free.
6g

• Use the included charcoal-infused sponge to blend The Fix onto your skin for buildable medium coverage.
• Prep the skin with primer to create a smooth surface and increase the grip of The Fix Powder Foundation.
• Spot touch blemishes and even out your complexion by spraying your brush with All Nighter Makeup Setting Spray before dipping into The Fix for more coverage that lasts.
• For light coverage: Whisk The Fix onto the face using a fluffy powder brush for soft, all-over coverage.
• For full coverage: Apply Stay Naked Weightless Liquid Foundation first, then build coverage with The Fix using the included sponge or a fluffy brush.

mp00063128.name: Urban Decay Stay Naked Threesome Bronzer, Blush And Highlighter Palette

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
Use Stay Naked Threesome's super-blendable and buildable bronzer, highlighter, or blush solo to spotlight features or combine for allover radiance. You get silky-smooth texture with a natural satin finish that never goes on streaky or cakey. Infused with moringa seed oil, Stay Naked Threesome’s weightless powder contains antioxidant and anti-pollution properties that help balance and protect skin.

Urban Decay is 100% cruelty-free.
14g

• Use a larger kabuki or foundation brush to sweep on all three powders together for a sun-kissed, effortless glow.
• Blend it over cheekbones and browbones and use it anywhere you want an extra highlight.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
This moisture-rich, long-wearing cushion foundation delivers 24 hours of non-stop hydration for a glowy, flawless finish.* Ultra-fine texture allows skin to breathe while instantly concealing imperfections. Buildable, non-transfer formula in a convenient compact for on the go glow. Helps protect skin’s beauty with Clarins’ Anti-Pollution Complex and SPF 50. Refillable compact means less waste—so it’s cleaner and greener. 

• 24-Hours of non-stop hydration
• Buildable coverage
• All day glowy finish
• Humidity resistant 
• Anti-pollution complex
• Six true tone shades 

*Clinical test carried out by 12 women over 24 hours.
This is a refill only.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
Fresh and smooth to the touch, it produces a beautiful luster as if the lips exude moisture.
(1) [Upper lip] Use the top of the tip to apply gloss, tracing the outline of the lip. For a more sophisticated, sexy look, apply gloss slightly outside the outline of the lips.
(2) [Lower lip] Use the width of the tip to apply gloss and extend it left and right to cover the lower lip.
(3) After bringing the upper and lower lips together to blend the color, apply more gloss over the central area of the lips to create dimensionality.

mp00046080.name: Jo Malone London Wood Sage & Sea Salt Body Crème

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Escape the everyday along the windswept shore. Waves breaking white, the air fresh with sea salt and spray. Alive with the mineral scent of the rugged cliffs. Mingling with the woody earthiness of sage. Lively, spirited and totally joyful. Our luxuriously rich Body Crème, with its conditioning oils of jojoba seed, cocoa seed and sweet almond, helps to moisturise, nourish and protect the skin, while delicious signature fragrances leave your body scented all over. Resized in miniature. Perfect for a scented escape.Jo Malone London Body Crème provides nutrition, and, at the same time, keeps your skin moisturized and flexible through its skin protection ingredients. The crème, which has a rich texture, can be applied to your whole body, or, to further maximize the fragrance, can be applied before spraying your favorite perfume.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
Rebel gel: This power pencil creates fiercely glossy, high-pigment looks, with a gel formula that looks as slick as a liquid and lasts—no matter where the day (and night) take you.

Up to 16-hour wear—so go out, and stay out, as long as you want to.
Ophthalmologist tested.
Glide this smooth gel eyeliner along your lash line for a glossy stripe in one easy swipe.
Break the rules! Mix and match shades to create your boldest winged liner look yet.
Here’s just 1 way to do it:
Apply 1 shade from the inner corner of your eye to the middle of your lid.
Then draw a totally different shade from the end of that line out past the outer corner of your eye to create your perfect wing.
Finally, if you really want to go there, trace a third shade along your lower lashes for a truly fierce effect.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Discover Rose aux Joues, Guerlain's new colour-revealing blush.Rosy cheeks with a delicate glow, as if you had just spent a day in the fresh air, with a lightweight imperceptible finish.A feat made possible by the new Rose aux Joues which brings a pink flush to your cheeks with a single sweep of the brush.Its Pink Booster pigments capture natural light and enhance your complexion's natural pink hue in perfect affinity with the skin.Fresh, powdery, golden...Rose aux Joues is offered in timeless shades for all seasons and occcasions.They perfectly match all KissKiss Roselip shades for a healthy and lightly flushed look.Smile and apply Rose aux Joues with the brush on the rounded part of your cheekbones to the temples.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Size matters—give your arches a hit of high volume with Brow Endowed. Perfect for less-than-full brows in need of a little fluffing, this double-ended tool lets you tame, tint, and tease in two steps. Use the soft-hold primer to amp up volume, then gently brush on the tinted brow cream to intensify. Our long-lasting formula resists sweat and smudging for up to 24 hours, so you can get from the conference call to last call without worries.Urban Decay is 100% cruelty-free.Urban Decay is beauty with an edge™.Primer 3.55g + Colour 4.25g1. To add extra volume to needy brows, sweep the primer in a downward motion on brow hair, then brush up and through the hairs.2. Follow up with the tinted cream for super-plush brows. Short strokes will help with precision. Combine primer/setting color with any brow product for anyone who needs to amp up the volume.3. Using the primer, start by brushing hairs in a downward motion. Immediately follow by brushing hairs in an upward motion to create the most dimension.4. Roll some tinted cream from color side onto the back of your hand. Apply with brow brush for a rich and defined version of brows.5.Use primer to keep hairs in place by brushing upward. After a few coats, hold brush in place against hairs for 60 seconds to prevent strays.6. Using tip of color brush, press directly onto skin for areas that are completely bare. Buff out with a few strokes after depositing color.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Everyone is an expert with this super easy filling & shaping eyebrow pencil. It features a custom, non-sharpen "goof-proof" tip, soft colour and a glide-on formula for easy & fast brow filling. Comes complete with built-in blending spoolie-brush and signature Tips & Tricks.1. Use the wide part of the custom goof-proof tip to fill & shape brows.2. Build colour with a couple of strokes.3. Use the pointed edge to define the "tail" of the brow.4. Blend with the spoolie-brush for that "real life" brow magic.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Define & highlight brows with this 4-in-1 contour pencil. This multi-tasking brow pencil features a lighter brow shade, deeper brow shade, edge definer and arch highlighter to create clean, shaped brows with depth & dimension. Turn shapeless, flat brows into defined, contoured brows in an instant.0.4g1. Press down the lighter shade tab and twist until product is visible.2. Fill in brow with lighter shade from start to arch. (To switch shades, just press down tab of selected shade until it clicks in place & twist for product.) 3. Fill in brow with deeper shade from arch to end.4. Stroke definer below brow from start to end and above brow from arch to end. Blend gently. 5. Apply highlighter beneath the arch and blend outward.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
A high precision lipstick with intense color that gives a blur finish.



LIPBRUSH INSPIRATION LIPSTICK REVOLUTION.

Our pros have developed their ideal lipstick combining the color intensity of a matte with the luminosity of a creamy hydrating lipstick. Rouge Artist is the best of both a satin and matte formula in one lipstick, for an ultimate color impact and beautiful lips in just one swipe.

classifications.name: How to apply
classifications.value:
APPLICATION WITH 1 ROUGE ARTIST SHADE
STEP 1: Click the lipstick cap on the back of the lipstick.
STEP 2: Apply ROUGE ARTIST to the center of the upper lip, following the cupid’s bow and apply the lipstick to the center of the lower lip.
STEP 3: Apply ROUGE ARTIST starting from each outer corner of the center of the upper lip.
STEP 4: Turn the bullet to use sharp part to give precision to the result.
STEP 5: Use the cap’s slanted end to clean and finish the application for an extra defined result.

APPLICATION WITH 2 ROUGE ARTIST SHADES
STEP 1: Click the lipstick cap on the back of the lipstick.
STEP 2: Apply the 1st shade of ROUGE ARTIST to color the upper lip.
STEP 3: Apply the 2nd shade of ROUGE ARTIST to color the lower lip.
STEP 4: Pinch the lips together to mix the shades.
STEP 5 (OPTIONAL): Finish the blending with the fingertips for a quick and blurred result or with a lip brush for a pro gesture and precision.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Foliage and revelry enliven the expansive terraces and noble arches of the ancient Hanging Gardens. Statuesque cypress trees infuse the air with their fresh, aromatic scent, powered with woody notes of trailing grapevines. Depths of amber ground this verdant scene in intensity and sensuality, for a bold and compelling effect.

classifications.name: How to apply
classifications.value: Suitable to spray on pulse points. You may use the fragrance on its own or combine it with another scent to create a scent that is uniquely yours.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
• With gentle care, Huile de Douche Relaxante nourishes and protects the skin against dryness.

  • Its enveloping formula cleanses the skin without aggression, leaving it supple, soft and delicately scented.

  • The floral fragrance of Huile de Douche Relaxante, combined with jasmine and white tea extracts offering relaxing and soothing properties, plunges you into a pure well-being and relaxation experience

  • IDEAL FOR: All skin types

  • TEXTURE: Silky oil

  • RESULTS: The skin is moisturised and nourished. It feels smooth and silky. The skin is delicately scented.

  • STAR ACTIVES:

  • Jasmine; white tea vegetal extracts

  • Gentle surfactants

  • Glycerine

  • YOUR PAYOT BEAUTY TIP:

  • For a complete well-being interlude, follow the PAYOT body routine:

  • Once or twice a week for skin that is always smooth and silky, massage your body with Gommage au Sucre Relaxant.

  • Moisturise and protect your skin against dryness with Huile de Douche Relaxante.

  • At any time of day, spray Eau de Soin Relaxante all over the body in a single step.

  • APPLICATION RITUAL: Apply to damp skin daily. Work into a lather and rinse thoroughly.

  • IDEAL FOR: All skin types

  • TEXTURE: Fresh liquid

  • RESULTS: The skin texture is refined. The complexion is radiant. The skin is clear, soft and radiant

  • STAR ACTIVES: Raspberry extracts, Hyaluronic acid, Pineapple extracts

  • YOUR PAYOT BEAUTY TIP: Apply Lotion Tonique Fraicheur after each contact of the skin with water to remove scale residues and have beautiful skin.

  • APPLICATION RITUAL: Apply morning and/or evening to a cleansed face and neck using a cotton pad

mp00058087.name: LANEIGE Two Tone Tint Lip Bar

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: Effortlessly lovely!This is the trick of two-toneTwo-tone with tint and lip balm1. V-cut quick touch smart gradationThe 7.5mm V-cut design brings out the optimum tint gradation with a single swipe for the perfect two tone lips in the most natural way.2. Stronger color contrastTint is used to enhance the color’s sustaining power and coloration to provide the two tone effect with the contrast of lip balm and a tint.3. Dead skin cell care with the strong moisture of Lip Sleeping MaskLip Sleeping Mask Moisture Wrap™ technology containing skin-purifying factors is applied to the hyaluronic acid mineral network to keep the lips moisturized by forming a moisture tank over the lips with a moisture-keeping film.4. Customized tinting for each individualThe tinting color, which changes depending on the lip pH and temperature, is applied to express customized tinting effect and to make the lips look healthy.2gSTEP 1. Lower lipPlace the lip bar on the lower lip so that the tint color can be applied on the inside of the lower lip.STEP 2. Upper lipReverse the lip bar so that the tint color of the V can be applied on the inside of the upper lipSTEP 3. GradationClose your lips~STEP 4. Gradation completedPurse your lips so that the colors can be blended well to create the natural gradation. Now, attractive Gradation Lip Makeup is completed.How to use Two-Tone Tint Lip Bar more stably and conveniently1. Lower the button to push the lipstick upward.2. Be sure to open the cap before lowering down the button.3. The lipstick can be easily broken, so lift the lipstick little by little.4. Pressing too hard on lips can push the lipstick back to the container, so lightly apply the lipstick while holding the button with your thumb.

mp00056556.name: GIORGIO ARMANI Cushion Tone Up Refill

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value: What it is:Discover the new must-have accessory for face: the Essence-In-Foundation Tone-Up Cushion. The most desirable and fashionable cushion in a trendy light pink case. Your new accessory for face. Make-up now meets skincare and offers the perfect bright dewy glowing foundation on the go with anti-ageing benefits and anti-pollution protection. Available in 6 tone-up shades that can be applied with Armani signature cushion applicator for effortlessly professional application and maximum precision. What it does: My Armani To Go Essence-In-Foundation Tone-Up Cushion offers a bright dewy glow with hydrated and fresh feeling. Its creamy & light texture provides multi protection feel for a breathable and natural bare skin. Research Result: 97% feels this foundation glides well on skin upon application 97% feels this foundation leaves the skin soft 96% feels this foundation provides a natural makeup result 90% feels this foundation leaves the skin comfortable all day long BRIGHT DEWY GLOW: A combination of whitening actives and micro-soft powder for an instant tone-up effect Emollient agents for a 24h moisturizing benefit ANTI-AGEING: Hyaluronic acid for a supple yet firm skin CREAMY AND LIGHT TEXTURE: For a breathable and natural bare skin15gUse for an entire make-up look or as a touch-up: 1. Gently soak the middle part of the professional applicator in the cushion. 2. Wipe the face perfectionist applicator across the skin to spread the product and dab the face to blend. 3. Use the triangular tip for maximum precision, around nose and eyes.REFILL:Please note it is a refill

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
A gentle, hydrating & volumizing daily shampoo.
Contains active botanical agents to cleanse hair while preserving its necessary moisture.
Creates natural lift at the roots while plumping up fine strands.
Adds extra body & fullness to hair Infused with note of Magnolia Flower to deliver a fresh, cheerful scent Perfect for all hair types.
Safe for color & keratin-treated hair, paraben-free

classifications.name: How to apply
classifications.value: Gently massage into wet hair.  Lather.  Rinse. Repeat if needed.  Follow with Weightless Volumzing Conditioner.

classifications.name: Beauty Ingredients
classifications.value: Water (Aqua), Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Fragrance (Parfum), Polysorbate 20, Cocamide DIPA , Sodium Methyl 2-Sulfolaurate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Water, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Water, Sodium Hyaluronate, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Extract, Tocopherol, Panthenol, Acrylates/Palmeth-25 Acrylate Copolymer, Disodium 2-Sulfolaurate, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Polyester- I I, Glycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Linalool, Limonene, Benzyl Salicylate, Hydroxycitronellal, Geraniol, Lillial.

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
A revolutionary thickening mist that delivers dramatic, sexy volume all day long, while leaving hair soft and glossy.

Spray it on dry hair: A combination of dry shampoo and hair-plumping polymers transforms even the limpest strands, giving you glamorous fullness and bouncy sexy hair just got easy.

Paraben & Phthalate Free Formula.

classifications.name: How to apply
classifications.value: Shake well. Spray liberally on dry hair from roots to ends; style and finish to perfection.

classifications.value: Hydrofluorocarbon 152a,Alcohol Denat., Butane, Acrylates/Octylacrylamide Copolymer, Isobutane, Tocopheryl Acetate, Panthenol, Achillea Millefolum (Yarrow) Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Flower Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Cymbopogon Schoenanthus (Lemongrass Extract), Geranium Maculatum (Cranesbill) Extract, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Bark/Leaf/Twig Extract, Melissa Officinalis (Balm Mint) Leaf Extract, Quercus Alba (Oak) Bark Extract, Rosa Canina (Rose Hip) Fruit Extract, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Symphytum Officinale (Comfrey) Extract, Cocodimonium Hydroxypropyl Hydrolyzed Keratin, Aluminum Starch Octenyl Succinate, Isohexadecane, Boron Nitrade, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Water/Aqua, Chlorphenesin, BHT, Benzoic Acid, Sorbic Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Salicylate, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Hexyl Cinnamal, Coumarin, Hydroxycitronellal, Linalool, Citronellol, Fragrance/Parfum

classifications.name: Description
classifications.value:
NEW SK-II SKINPOWER Essence. Supercharge your skin for a youthful, healthy look.



SK-II has pioneered a new solution around the dynamics of skin power that recharges skin’s youthful, healthy look. A revolutionary & SK-II exclusive ingredient complex, InfinitPower Technology is designed to supercharge the power source of your skin to plump up* from within**.



Say goodbye to low-power moments. With this boost of skin power, your constantly moisturized skin resists low-power moments*** caused by daily stressors and powers up to look and feel bouncy, smooth and glowing.



With a clear and dewy texture, the concentrated formula pushes ingredients through skin layers** for deep hydration with a fresh feeling.



Featuring a specially designed auto-dropper, one push for one drop is the optimal dosage for each application.



*Via hydration

**Stratum corneum

***Refers to skin conditions such as dryness

classifications.name: How to apply
classifications.value:
Dropper automatically fills upon opening tightly-closed cap. Release a dropper-full⁺ of serum into your palm and smooth evenly over face. Re-close cap tightly after each use, taking care not to press down on the rubber dropper head.

⁺A single pump of the dropper will give you the optimal dosage. Manually refill by pushing down on the rubber dropper head if more serum is desired.

Use twice a day, morning and night.
